property_title: Three-bedroom Apartments at the residential complex
property_description:
Located just 250 meters from the beach in Bečići, one of Montenegro’s most picturesque coastal towns, the Galop residential complex offers a unique opportunity to own a modern apartment with stunning sea views in an elegant residential setting. Only a 5-minute drive from Budva, the famed “Queen of the Mediterranean,” this development combines comfort, prime location, and long-term investment potential.

Key Features:

  • Brand-new development with direct sea views from most of the apartments
    • Wide selection of residential units, including studio apartments, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom layouts
    • Surrounded by shops, restaurants, and one of the most beautiful beaches on the Budva Riviera
    • No real estate tax for buyers – direct purchase from investor

The complex consists of four buildings: “Arched”, “Lineski”, “Tower”, and the “Apartment Building”. The complex will feature a swimming pool, underground garage parking, and commercial premises.

Avaliable three-bedroom apartments:

  • “ARCHED BUILDING”, B61, 6THfloor, 135.41m², PRICE 514,558€
  • “ARCHED BUILDING”, B64, 6THfloor, 134.18m², PRICE 509,884€
  • “ARCHED BUILDING”, B65, 6THfloor, 133.09m², PRICE 505,742€

Parking places in the underground garage are avaliable at an additional charge of 25,000€.

This location in Bečići offers excellent connectivity, with just 26 km to Tivat Airport and 61 km to Podgorica Airport. This complex presents an excellent opportunity, whether you’re seeking a personal coastal retreat or a profitable real estate investment, offering the perfect combination of location, lifestyle, and luxury.

Contact us today for more information or to schedule a virtual or in-person tour.

property_title: Modern 4-Bedroom Apart Villa with Panoramic Sea Views
property_description:
Perched on the peaceful hills of Blizikuće, just above the world-famous Sveti Stefan, this spectacular villa offers unmatched panoramic views of the Adriatic Sea, elegant living spaces, and a level of privacy and tranquility rarely found on the coast. Designed for refined lifestyles and unforgettable gatherings, the property also represents an exceptional investment opportunity in Montenegro’s thriving luxury market.

The villa was conceived and built as a hotel unit, featuring four fully equipped apartments and one studio apartment intended for staff, located on the ground floor. On the ground floor, a restaurant with a kitchen is located, capable of satisfying the needs of the entire complex. The future owner of this facility can also create an à la carte restaurant for both the complex’s guests and other visitors.

Key Features:

  • Four fully furnished apartments, each with bedrooms, private bathrooms, and terraces
  • A ground-floor restaurant with a kitchen
  • Underfloor heating throughout
  • Infinity pool with pergola and sun deck
  • Studio apartment for staff, with separate entrance
  • High-end finishes:
    • Italian Florim ceramics,
    • Villeroy & Boch sanitary ware,
    • Dornbracht & Hansgrohe faucets,
    • Premium wooden parquet,
    • Custom interior doors and Maljat natural stone façade
    • Aluminum windows and stone-paved exterior

This 345 m² villa sits in a gated residential complex with dedicated parking and infrastructure built to the highest European standards. In terms of location and connectivity, it is just 13 km from Budva Old Town, 33.7 km from Tivat International Airport, and 56.2 km from Podgorica International Airport.

Whether you are looking for a dream family retreat or a premium income-generating property, this villa offers the best of both worlds—privacy, elegance, and investment potential on the coveted Montenegrin coast.

Contact us today for more information or to schedule your private viewing.

Located on the Zavala Peninsula, Harmonia is nestled between Budva’s bustling town and the serene beaches of Bečići, offering an ideal balance of energy and tranquility. These modern three-bedroom apartments are situated on the upper floors of the building, ensuring panoramic views of the Adriatic Sea and the Budva Riviera.

  • A001, 5th floor, 189 m² – €831,600
  • E401, 4th floor, 125 m² – €675,000

  • C201, 7h floor, 149 m² – €700,300 (DUPLEX)
  • C601, 11th floor, 149 m² – €715,200 (DUPLEX)

Apartment Features:

  • Spacious terraces with stunning sea views
  • Modern kitchens with premium appliances

  • Central air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and smart home automation

property_title: One-Bedroom Apartments in Kotor BayView Residences
property_description:
Kotor BayView Residences redefines luxury coastal living in one of the world’s most breathtaking bays – the Bay of Kotor. Ideally located in the heart of the bay, this exclusive residential complex offers uninterrupted views of the crystal-clear Adriatic Sea and the dramatic surrounding mountains.

Designed to blend modern architecture with the cultural and historical richness of the region, each unit in Kotor BayView combines comfort, privacy, and style. The buildings harmoniously reflect the traditional Mediterranean landscape, featuring local stone and architectural elements reminiscent of the coastal heritage homes of Boka Bay.

Property Highlights:

  • Spacious layouts with panoramic bay views
  • Contemporary Mediterranean design using natural materials
  • Carefully designed interiors that maximize comfort and functionality
  • Ideal year-round living with mild climate and stunning sunsets
  • Two outdoor saltwater swimming pools within the complex
  • Landscaped green areas for relaxation and recreation
  • Private parking included, garage spaces available (€20,000)
  • Option for full interior furnishing at €600/m²
  • Advanced security systems for peace of mind

Available One-Bedroom Apartments:

  • Building A, AJ3, second floor – 46 m² + 11 m² terrace – RESERVED
  • Building A, AJ2, second floor – 44 m² + 11 m² terrace – RESERVED
  • Building A, AJ, first floor – 44 m² + 10 m² terrace – €235,884
  • Building A, AJ1, first floor – 44 m² + 10 m² terrace – €236,324
  • Building B, BJ2, second floor – 44 m² + 11 m² terrace – €259,769
  • Building C, CJ2, second floor – 44 m² + 11 m² terrace – SOLD
  • Building D, DJ3, second floor – 46 m² + 11 m² terrace – SOLD
  • Building D, DJ2, second floor – 44 m² + 11 m² terrace – SOLD
  • Building D, DJ, second floor – 44 m² + 10 m² terrace – SOLD

Prime Location:

  • Kotor Old Town: 6.4 km
  • Tivat Airport: 7.7 km
  • Porto Montenegro Marina: 11 km
  • Podgorica Airport: 87 km

With its exceptional location, high-end features, and proximity to UNESCO-listed Kotor, Kotor BayView Residences is more than just a place to live – it’s a lifestyle destination. Whether you are seeking a peaceful year-round home or a high-yield investment, this development offers a perfect blend of luxury, tradition, and natural beauty.

Contact us today to schedule a private tour or request more information.

property_title: Villa Talia – Five-Bedroom Luxury Villa with Panoramic Sea Views
property_description:
Welcome to Villa Talia, an exclusive five-bedroom retreat within “The View” – a prestigious enclave of premium villas located above the Šušanj neighborhood in Bar municipality, Montenegro. Surrounded by Mediterranean nature and offering unobstructed panoramic views of the Adriatic Sea, this luxury villa blends modern sophistication with timeless comfort.

In short words, Villa Talia is the perfect Mediterranean escape. Elegantly designed with natural materials and expansive glass surfaces, Villa Talia seamlessly connects indoor and outdoor living spaces. Whether you’re hosting guests or simply relaxing in privacy, this villa has it all:

  • A spacious open-concept living area with large windows and designer finishes
  • A fully equipped indoor kitchen and outdoor summer kitchen with grill

Located just 250 meters from the beach in the charming coastal town of Bečići, this elegant 4-bedroom duplex apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort, space, and investment potential. Nestled within a newly built residential complex only 5 minutes from Budva, the apartment provides breathtaking sea views and easy access to all urban amenities.

 

Apartment Highlights:
• 192.48 m² of well-designed living space over two floors
• 4 spacious bedrooms and three modern bathrooms
• Expansive open-plan living and dining area with a sea-view terrace
• Master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom
• Laundry room and storage places on the top floor
• Large floor-to-ceiling windows provide natural light throughout
• Smart layout ideal for family living or hosting guests

 

Residential Complex Amenities:
• Brand-new development with high-quality finishes
• Swimming pool and landscaped common areas
• Underground garage parking (available at €25,000)
• On-site retail and dining options
• No real estate tax – direct purchase from investor

 

Prime Location:
• 250m to Bečići Beach
• 5-minute drive to Budva Old Town
• 26 km to Tivat Airport | 61 km to Podgorica Airport
• Close to supermarkets, restaurants, and wellness centers

property_title: Elegant One-Bedroom Apartments in Budva Riviera
property_description:
Discover the charm of coastal living in these two stylish one-bedroom apartments for sale in Pržno, one of the most picturesque and sought-after destinations on the Budva Riviera. Pržno, once a quaint fishing village, has evolved into a serene seaside haven known for its beautiful beaches (Pržno Beach, Queen’s Beach, Kamenovo) and its proximity to the iconic Sveti Stefan island.

These brand-new, fully furnished apartments are ready for immediate move-in. Each unit is thoughtfully designed with contemporary finishes and equipped with high-quality appliances for a modern, comfortable experience.

Avaliable apartments:

  • Apartment 16A (third floor) – 74 m², mountain view, €235,000 + real estate sales tax
  • Apartment 3B (first floor) – 87 m², sea view, €260,000 + real estate sales tax

Both apartments include furniture and a private parking space.

Whether you’re seeking a peaceful coastal retreat or a smart investment opportunity, these apartments are ideal. Pržno is a vibrant year-round destination, making short- and long-term rentals highly attractive. The strong tourism season in this part of the Montenegrin coast ensures excellent rental potential.

Connectivity:

  • 5 km to Old Town Budva
  • 28 km to Tivat Airport
  • 59 km to Podgorica Airport
  • Well-connected by public transport with direct bus lines to Budva and surrounding areas

Enjoy the best of the Adriatic lifestyle—tranquility, stunning scenery, and strong investment returns—all in one exceptional location. Contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.

property_title: Modern Four-Bedroom Family Villa with Rooftop Pool and Panoramic Sea Views
property_description:
Experience the perfect harmony of modern design, natural surroundings, and unparalleled comfort in this stunning villa situated in the tranquil hills of Kavač, within the Kotor municipality. Just 15 minutes from Tivat and Kotor, and only 10 minutes from major shopping centers, this hillside retreat offers both serenity and convenience.

Key Features:

  • Breathtaking views of the Bay of Tivat and magical sunsets
  • Rooftop pool (5.5 x 4 m) with a spacious sun terrace and summer kitchen for entertaining
  • Nestled in a private pine forest, offering peace, shade, and the scent of nature
  • Southwest-facing orientation ensures sunshine year-round
  • 480 m² of living space on a generously sized plot
  • Elegant open-plan living room with soaring 6-meter ceilings and a designer electric fireplace
  • Fully equipped kitchen and dining area included; the rest of the villa is unfurnished, allowing future owners to decorate to their own taste
  • 4 bedrooms including a dedicated kids’ hall — ideal for play, study, or reading
  • 4 bathrooms (2 full + 2 guest toilets) with modern finishes
  • Top-tier AERMEC heating and ventilation system with water-based underfloor heating on the ground level
  • Multiple technical and storage rooms for optimal functionality
  • Private parking for up to 7 vehicles

Whether you’re seeking a year-round family residence or a summer getaway, this home is built for lasting comfort, luxury, and connection to nature. The unique microclimate of Kavač offers refreshing breezes, cooler air, and an escape from coastal humidity — all just minutes from the Adriatic coast.

This villa is almost ready for immediate move-in. Don’t miss the opportunity to own a peaceful oasis with unbeatable views and exceptional design.

Contact us today to arrange a viewing and experience this property in person.

property_title: One-Bedroom Apartments in SEASIDE Anatolia – Coastal Living near Budva
property_description:
Located just 200 meters from the beach in Bečići, one of Montenegro’s most picturesque coastal towns, SEASIDE Anatolia offers a unique opportunity to own a modern apartment with sea views in an elegant residential complex. Key Features:

  • Brand-new development with direct sea views from every apartment, even on the ground floor
    • Wide selection of 39 residential units, including one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom layouts
    • Surrounded by shops, restaurants, and one of the most beautiful beaches on the Budva Riviera
    • No real estate tax for buyers – direct purchase from investor
    • Fully clean ownership with no encumbrances or mortgages

Premium Amenities:

  • Indoor and outdoor swimming pools
    • Modern fitness and gym area
    • Underground garage parking
    • Two commercial premises within the building

property_title: Two-Bedroom Apartments in Onia Hills – Luxury, Nature & Sea Views
property_description:
Onia Hills Resort & Residences presents a rare opportunity to own a stylish one-bedroom apartment within a sustainable luxury complex, situated in the lush hills of Reževići, just minutes from the Adriatic coast. With breathtaking panoramic sea views, exceptional architecture, and resort-style amenities, this development is designed for those seeking both tranquility and comfort.

Property Highlights

  • Fully furnished one-bedroom apartments with a thoughtfully designed layout
  • Private gardens, terraces, or additional outdoor areas in select units
  • Natural stone facades and interior finishes inspired by Mediterranean landscapes
  • Panoramic views of the sea, olive groves, and surrounding hills
  • Energy-efficient systems, including high-performance solar panels
  • Over 70 century-old olive trees preserved on site

The Onia Hills complex is designed to have World-Class Amenities:

  • Five-star boutique hotel & four-star residences
    • Indoor swimming pool & full spa & wellness center
    • Two restaurants & a fitness center
    • Kids’ club, conference hall & concierge service
    • Secure parking & beautifully landscaped communal areas
    • Direct access to coastal hiking paths and nearby beaches

Avaliable two-bedroom apartments:

  • BUILDING D, apartment D101, first floor, 90.27m²+additional 11.60m², PRICE 460,377€
  • BUILDING D, apartment D201, penthouse, 90.27m², PRICE 460,377€

Parking places are avaliable in underground garage and cost additional 25,000€.

Situated between Budva and Petrovac, Reževići offers peace, privacy, and pristine nature, while being just minutes from some of Montenegro’s most celebrated beaches: Drobni Pijesak – 1.2 km, Sveti Stefan – 1.8 km, Galija Beach Club – 2.9 km. There are three international airports nearby: Tivat, 32 km away; Podgorica, 62 km away; and Dubrovnik (Croatia), 81 km away.

Why Onia Hills?

✔️ Exclusive resort setting with hotel-level service
✔️ Eco-conscious construction and energy efficiency
✔️ Proven investment potential with tourism growth
✔️ Ideal for year-round living, vacation, or premium rental income

Whether you’re looking for a second home by the sea, a long-term investment, or a serene escape into Mediterranean luxury, Onia Hills is the perfect choice.  Contact us today for a full brochure or to arrange a private tour of this spectacular hillside retreat.

property_title: Cosy Two-Bedroom House with a Sea View
property_description:
Nestled in the tranquil olive groves of Bartula, just 10 minutes from the beaches and city center of Bar, this newly constructed two-story home offers comfort, privacy, and stunning views of the sea and mountains.

Situated in a cascading complex of four modern villas, the property is surrounded by nature and features five mature olive trees, a landscaped garden, and a charming barbecue area—perfect for enjoying the Mediterranean lifestyle.

This newly-built house has two levels. The ground floor features a spacious entrance terrace (which can be converted into a wardrobe, entrance hall, or additional bedroom), a hallway, two comfortable bedrooms, a large bathroom, and an internal staircase. On the first floor, a bright, open-concept living room features panoramic views of the sea and mountains, along with a kitchen and dining area, a guest toilet, and a large terrace perfect for relaxing or entertaining.

Additional Amenities:

✅ Fully furnished and equipped with modern appliances
✅ Underfloor water-based heating system on the ground floor
✅ Air conditioning on both levels
✅ Panoramic sliding windows (3×3 m) provide an abundance of natural light
✅ Spring water connection
✅ Landscaped garden with barbecue area
✅ Set within a quiet villa complex with olive trees and Mediterranean vegetation

Why Choose Bar? Bar is Montenegro’s only coastal city that remains active year-round, offering top infrastructure, schools, healthcare, and shopping centers. It is also the only Montenegrin port with a ferry connection to Italy (Bar-Bari line), making it a hub of convenience and connectivity.

Whether you’re looking for a cozy family home or a tranquil second residence, this house offers a perfect blend of modern comfort, scenic beauty, and Mediterranean charm.

Contact us today to schedule a viewing or learn more about this exceptional property in Bar.

property_title: Two-bedroom apartments for sale in Oliva Park
property_description:
Located in the tranquil Liman neighborhood of Ulcinj, Oliva Park is a premium residential complex that combines modern luxury, advanced building technology, and the calming presence of nature. Nestled between olive groves and the Adriatic coast, this development offers a unique lifestyle opportunity in one of Montenegro’s most picturesque seaside towns.

Designed with low urban density and contemporary architecture, Oliva Park features two residential buildings with 63 apartments in total, many of which offer stunning sea views. The project integrates high-efficiency systems, quality materials, and communal amenities to provide a new standard of living in Ulcinj.

Avaliable two-bedroom apartments:

BUILDING A

  • A33, third floor, 73m², PRICE 197.100€
  • A43, fourth floor, 66m², PRICE 191.400€

BUILDING B

  • B01, ground floor, 72m², PRICE 151.200€
  • B11, first floor, 72m², PRICE 165.600€
  • B31, third floor, 76m², PRICE 205.200€
  • B41, fourth floor, 76m², PRICE 220.400€

Key Features:

  • Sea views from most units
  • Outdoor swimming pool
  • Modern design with smart home features
  • Private parking
  • High-quality finishes and building materials
  • Peaceful green surroundings

Liman is a serene coastal quarter located near the Old Town and Ulcinj Castle, renowned for its pristine beaches, ancient olive groves, and laid-back ambiance. The famous Liman II beach is just steps away, popular for its clear waters and full amenities. The complex is situated in an area that has attracted significant investments, promising continued development and property appreciation.

Ulcinj is one of the sunniest towns on the Adriatic, boasting over 240 sunny days a year and the longest sandy beach in Europe. It is just:
✈️ 74 km from Podgorica Airport
✈️ 117 km from Tirana International Airport

Oliva Park presents a fantastic opportunity to own a modern home in one of Montenegro’s most naturally beautiful and culturally rich destinations. Whether you’re looking for a peaceful residence or a smart investment with excellent rental potential, this complex offers the best of both worlds.

Contact us today to learn more or schedule a viewing.

property_title: Two-Bedroom Apartments for Sale – Boka Gardens
property_description:
Welcome to “Boka Gardens”, a newly built residential complex nestled in the peaceful and green setting of Dobrota, one of the most desirable parts of the Bay of Kotor. Located just 300 meters from the Adriatic coast and minutes from the historic Old Town of Kotor, this development offers a perfect balance of Mediterranean tranquility, comfort, and modern architecture.

Surrounded by palm trees, pines, and oleanders, “Boka Gardens” combines elevated living with breathtaking views of the bay and the Vrmac peninsula. The complex is designed for those seeking peaceful coastal living, permanent residence, or a smart investment in Montenegro’s thriving property market.

Available Two-Bedroom Apartments:

  • LAMELA A, A2 – 51.96 m² – €214,990

Key Features:

  • Spacious and functional layouts
  • Underground garage with elevator access

property_title: Four-bedroom penthouse apartment in the Zaha Place residential building
property_description:
Discover exceptional living at Zaha Place, a premium residential building in the heart of Bar, Montenegro – the sunniest city in Europe! Designed with meticulous attention to detail, Zaha Place blends architectural excellence, outstanding construction quality, and lush landscaping to create a perfect sanctuary for modern living.

Key Features:

  • German-backed project built to EU standards;
  • High energy efficiency and superior soundproofing;
  • Split air conditioning and underfloor heating included;
  • Spacious design with sea views and large terraces for outdoor enjoyment;
  • Reinforced concrete structure, earthquake-resistant up to 9.5 on the Richter scale;
  • Only 800 meters from the sea and 1,000 meters from the city center.

This penthouse apartment has an open-plan living room with an entrance to a terrace with sun beds and a swimming pool, a dining room and kitchen, four bedrooms, three bathrooms, a laundry room, a guest toilet, and a wardrobe. It is positioned on the tenth floor of the building and has a magnificent sea view.

The complex contains modern, technologically equipped elevators. Two electric vehicle chargers are located within the garage’s parking lot.

Bar is Montenegro’s only commercial port, a key railway hub, and soon the terminus for the European highway and a future high-speed rail connection. Thanks to its strategic position, real estate in Bar enjoys annual appreciation rates of up to 20%, strong rental demand, and long-term value growth.

Own your slice of the Mediterranean – with security, style, and smart investment potential.
Contact us today to schedule a viewing or to learn more!

property_title: President Hotel & Residences – Two-bedroom condos for sale
property_description:
Experience contemporary luxury living at the heart of Budva with President Hotel & Residences—a chic twelve-story condo hotel that redefines upscale coastal living. Combining modern design with natural, beach-inspired elements, this exclusive development offers 66 luxury one-bedroom apartments (and 88 hotel rooms) that effortlessly blend the best of the Budva Riviera with the world-class amenities and services of a 5-star hotel.

Unparalleled Features & Amenities:

  • Spectacular Views: Almost every unit boasts open sea views, while expansive terraces with pools and lush landscaping create natural shade and ambiance.
  • Exclusive On-Site Facilities: The ground level hosts offices, boutiques, two restaurants, and a café offering breathtaking views of the sea and promenade. Residents also enjoy a state-of-the-art wellness center with swimming pools, a gym, and a conference room with a separate covered entrance. A green oasis atop the conference room is perfect for relaxing and enjoying unforgettable sunsets.
  • Additional Luxuries: For those seeking an even higher level of refinement, luxurious penthouses with verdant patios, hot tubs, and unparalleled sea views are available. Beautifully landscaped lawns, broad pathways, and seasonal flowering plants enhance the overall atmosphere, creating a comfortable microclimate year-round.

Situated only a few hundred meters from the city marina and the historic Old Town of Budva, President Hotel & Residences benefits from an unbeatable location. Tivat International Airport is approximately 30 km away, while Podgorica International Airport is around 60 km, ensuring excellent connectivity for both leisure and business travel.

Operating on a mixed model, owners can retain their residence for personal use or entrust its management and rental to the hotel operator—guaranteeing rental for at least 10 months a year. This unique opportunity provides a luxurious living space and an attractive investment prospect in a vibrant Mediterranean destination.

Available Two-Bedroom Units:

  • Apartment 401 (4th Floor, 134.55m²) – from €1,037,000
  • Apartment 501 (5th Floor, 134.55m²) – from €1,105,000
  • Apartment 601 (6th Floor, 134.55m²) – from €1,185,000
  • Apartment 701 (7th Floor, 134.55m²) – from €1,265,000
  • Apartment 801 (8th Floor, 134.55m²) – from €1,320,000
  • Apartment 901 (9th Floor, 234.55m²) – from €1,462,000

The apartment has an entrance hall, a living room with a dining area and a kitchen, two bathrooms, a guest toilet and laundry, and a terrace. 205 parking spaces are available in the underground levels (-2 and -1).

Completion of the hotel and residences is expected by the end of 2026.

Embrace the epitome of luxury living at President Hotel & Residences, where modern comfort, exceptional service, and stunning Mediterranean views come together. Contact us today for more information on these extraordinary two-bedroom condos in Budva. Your gateway to a refined coastal lifestyle awaits.

property_title: One-bedroom apartments in Vuelo Sobre complex
property_description:
Discover upscale coastal living in the Vuelo Sobre residential complex, perfectly positioned on the slope of the Budva Riviera in Bečići. These newly built one-bedroom apartments offer modern luxury and comfort in an idyllic, ecologically pristine setting. Surrounded by lush vegetation, each suite boasts unique views of the sea, mountains, and cityscape—providing a serene escape from the urban hustle while still embracing a contemporary lifestyle.

Key Features of these beautiful apartments include exceptional views, elegant design, premium finishes, and luxurious amenities. You can enjoy incomparable vistas of the Adriatic Sea and St. Nikola Island (Hawaii Beach) from your apartment, the rooftop pool, and the terrace. Each apartment has been thoughtfully crafted using top-quality materials and high-end appliances. Suites are sold unfurnished with refined final finishes, air conditioning, and bathroom floor heating.

Also, there is a rooftop swimming pool, sauna, and summer kitchen ideal for relaxation and gatherings, an underground parking with 105 spaces, separate storage rooms, and a gym. The complex has a landscaped yard with a playground, benches, and a fountain, and each owner enjoys separate access to a personal mini-yard.

The Vuelo Sobre complex has a prime location in a picturesque, ecologically clean area with a unique urban landscape far from city noise. It is situated above the Splendid and Mediterranean hotels, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the Adriatic, mountains, and city.

property_title: Modern two-bedroom apartments in Maya Adriatic residential complex
property_description:
These modern two-bedroom apartments are located in the Maya Adriatic residential complex in Kumbor at the entrance of the Bay of Boka. The complex is in the embrace of the sun and sea, away from the city noise and bustle, close to the famous Portonovi residential area and luxury yacht marina. This complex impresses with its peaceful atmosphere, stunning natural beauty, and crystal-clear water. Unspoiled beaches and panoramic views of the Bay of Kotor create ideal conditions for vacation and accommodation.

The development offers two different types of 56 residential units in three buildings. Its original architecture is designed to meet the highest standards of luxury and comfort, with meticulously designed interiors, lush gardens, and spacious balconies and terraces overlooking the sea, providing maximum comfort and value for your stay.

Avaliable two-bedroom apartments:

  • APARTMENT B-3, first floor, 54.34m²+ terrace 8.68m²
  • APARTMENT B-4, first floor, 54.34m²+ terrace 8.68m²
  • APARTMENT B-7, first floor, 54.34m²+ terrace 8.68m²

There is a shared outside infinity swimming pool with a sunbathing area, an inside swimming pool for all-year use, a SPA&Welnes area, a gym, and a rooftop bar ideal for parties and gatherings with family and friends. There are underground garages with car elevators and electric car chargers. In A Maya Adriatic complex, you will always be able to feel the magic of the Mediterranean away from the city’s noise and bustle. The complex is close to the sea, city center, and historical and tourist places thanks to its central location. This makes the beauty of living in Montenegro a real privilege.

A Maya Adriatic complex presents a compelling investment opportunity. Montenegro’s booming tourism industry and increasing demand for luxury properties make your apartment a sound investment with high rental yields and capital appreciation potential. Contact us today for more information or to arrange a viewing. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and cultural richness in this Kumbor development.

property_title: Two-bedroom apartments for sale in Emerald Residences
property_description:
Discover a rare concept in Montenegro’s residential offerings at Emerald Residences—a true green oasis spread over 1.3 hectares in the heart of Bar. These one-bedroom apartments, with areas starting from 36m² and prices from €78,002, are designed to offer the comforts of a luxurious hotel right at your doorstep.

Emerald Residences has exclusive amenities: a private green oasis complete with a SPA, on-site reception in every building, and a dedicated car garage; on-site restaurant and comprehensive service offerings ensure hotel-like convenience with close proximity to the sea, majestic mountains, and parks with mature olive trees for ultimate relaxation.

The apartments are designed as modern living spaces. Bright and spacious two-bedroom apartments have an open-plan living room, ample storage niches, and a balcony offering partial sea views. High-quality finishes, including marble-effect porcelain stoneware in common areas, floor heating, laminated parquet in bedrooms, and Fujitsu air conditioning systems for year-round comfort.

The complex has two swimming pools: an adult pool (23 x 10 m, 1.4 m deep) and a children’s pool with water slides (4 x 2.5 m, 0.6 m deep). The Residences are near sports facilities such as the city stadium of Bar, a sports palace with a basketball hall and fitness center, and a planned on-site fitness zone.

Emerald Residences offers a wide selection of two-bedroom apartments across multiple buildings (A, B, and C), with unit sizes ranging from 36m² to approximately 57m². Prices vary depending on the floor and terrace size, with attractive options starting at €78,002.

property_title: One-bedroom apartments for sale in Emerald Residences
property_description:
Discover a rare concept in Montenegro’s residential offerings at Emerald Residences—a true green oasis spread over 1.3 hectares in the heart of Bar. These one-bedroom apartments, with areas starting from 36m² and prices from €78,002, are designed to offer the comforts of a luxurious hotel right at your doorstep.

Emerald Residences has exclusive amenities: a private green oasis complete with a SPA, on-site reception in every building, and a dedicated car garage; on-site restaurant and comprehensive service offerings ensure hotel-like convenience with close proximity to the sea, majestic mountains, and parks with mature olive trees for ultimate relaxation.

The apartments are designed as modern living spaces. Bright and spacious one-bedroom apartments have an open-plan living room, ample storage niches, and a balcony offering partial sea views. High-quality finishes, including marble-effect porcelain stoneware in common areas, floor heating, laminated parquet in bedrooms, and Fujitsu air conditioning systems for year-round comfort.

The complex has two swimming pools: an adult pool (23 x 10 m, 1.4 m deep) and a children’s pool with water slides (4 x 2.5 m, 0.6 m deep). The Residences are near sports facilities such as the city stadium of Bar, a sports palace with a basketball hall and fitness center, and a planned on-site fitness zone.

Emerald Residences offers a wide selection of one-bedroom apartments across multiple buildings (A, B, and C), with unit sizes ranging from 36m² to approximately 57m². Prices vary depending on the floor and terrace size, with attractive options starting at €78,002.

property_title: Modern Two-Bedroom Apartments in Lazure Residential Complex
property_description:
Discover upscale living in the heart of the Herceg Novi Riviera at the Lazure Residential Complex. Developed with a limited number of apartments to create a close-knit and harmonious community, Lazure offers residents an exceptional, carefree lifestyle complemented by year-round access to all five-star hotel facilities and services at Lazure Resort.

Key features of the apartments include spacious and stylish living. Modern two-bedroom apartments start from 99.82 m², featuring two bathrooms and expansive terraces. They have open-plan living spaces with a dining area and kitchen, complete with premium finishes, floor heating, air conditioning, a dishwasher, and a washing machine—designed to provide the comfort of a five-star hotel at home. Each floor has state-of-the-art rack rooms for optical cables and telecommunications, ensuring high-speed connectivity with complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas and 55 SAT channels in every apartment.

For future owners, there are exclusive perks and investment benefits. Purchasing an apartment grants you the right to a free berth in Lazure Marina for one year (usable within three years). Optional parking spaces are available for purchase at €30,000 each.

These apartments are ideal for families and individuals looking for a comfortable home away from home, whether for permanent residence or a luxurious vacation retreat.

Available Two-Bedroom Apartments:

  • Apartment A305 – Third Floor: 114.28 m² + 15.07 m² terrace | Price: €751,500
  • Apartment B301 – Third Floor: 83.96 m² + 15.86 m² terrace | Price: €572,000

Lazure Residences offers World-Class Property Management. Owners can enjoy comprehensive services including reception, concierge, 24-hour security with video surveillance, housekeeping, and maintenance of all common areas (garage, lobby, elevators, greenery, etc.). The management team also handles annual certifications, bill and tax payments, property insurance, and quarterly reporting, ensuring your investment is always well maintained. Owners also benefit from exclusive discounts via a residential card, free use of SPA facilities and an indoor pool, and participation in an attractive rental program.

Situated at the entrance to the UNESCO World Heritage Bay of Kotor, Lazure Marina offers an unparalleled experience for those seeking both comfort and adventure. Surrounded by majestic mountains that shield you from the elements, the marina is a peaceful haven where seafaring enthusiasts can indulge in world-class amenities, exquisite dining, and the natural beauty of Montenegro’s stunning coastline.

If you’re ready to elevate your lifestyle with a new home in the Mediterranean, these exceptional two-bedroom apartments in the Lazure Residential Complex are the perfect opportunity. Contact us today for more information or to arrange a viewing.

property_title: One-bedroom apartment in the Aura Tower building
property_description:
Aura Tower is an exceptional residential building in Rafailovići, only 120 steps from the main beach. This building, recognizable for its unique design and use of natural stone, offers a luxurious life in the heart of the Montenegrin coast, perfectly harmonized with the environment and modern housing needs.

Aura Tower stands out not only for its beautiful appearance but also for its functionality. The building’s characteristic design is visible from all sides, making it a real architectural gem in Rafailovići. For comfortable living, Aura Tower provides parking spaces, modern equipment, and all the necessary facilities that make life simple and luxurious.

The location of Aura Tower makes living there simple and comfortable. The main highway is in the immediate vicinity, so you can easily connect to all important destinations on the Montenegrin coast. Restaurants, cafes, shops, and the main beach of Rafailovica are only a few minutes away. This facility is ideal for all those who want to enjoy all the charms of the sea but also the everyday practicalities offered by the modern city.

The apartment has a living room with a dining room and kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, and a terrace with a beautiful sea view. Indoor garage parking is available at an additional 30,000€. It is positioned on the fifth floor of the building.

In addition to its stunning surroundings, Aura View is near several appealing beaches, such as Kamenovo and Pržno—famed for their crystal-clear waters and picturesque landscapes. Budva is only a few minutes away, ensuring residents can enjoy the vibrant city life while returning to the peace and serenity of their home at Aura Tower.

Combining luxury, nature, and extraordinary views, the Aura Tower apartment is the perfect place for those who desire a refined lifestyle close to all the amenities and attractions of Budva. Contact us today to find out more or arrange a viewing.

property_title: Small hotel for sale
property_description:
Located in Herceg Novi, one of Montenegro’s most popular tourist destinations, this small apart hotel offers a good investment opportunity. Herceg Novi, nestled at the entrance of the stunning Bay of Kotor, is known for its historic landmarks, vibrant culture, and reputation as a spa and wellness center. The town is home to iconic attractions like the Forte Mare Castle, the Austrian Clock Tower, and the Kanli Tower, making it a magnet for both history lovers and travelers seeking relaxation.

Guests are welcomed into the cozy atmosphere of these apartments, which offer breathtaking views of the sea and the town of Herceg Novi. The villa has 10 apartments with bathrooms on two floors. The yard has a sunbath area and a swimming pool with a hot tub. There is also a sauna on the ground level.

Herceg Novi is a bustling destination with excellent connectivity. The hotel is only 25 km from the luxury Porto Montenegro Marina and Tivat International Airport and 27 km from Dubrovnik Airport, providing easy access for international travelers.

Contact us today for more details and to arrange a viewing.

property_title: Two-bedroom apartments in River Side Complex
property_description:
Discover the ultimate in comfortable, upscale living at the River Side Complex—the only residential development in Igalo, Herceg Novi municipality, boasting its comprehensive infrastructure for a truly convenient lifestyle. Set in low-rise buildings that exude coziness and elegance, River Side offers an inviting atmosphere where you can relax with your family, enjoy a meal in an on-site café serving European and Mediterranean cuisine, and experience all the benefits of resort town living.

The complex offers modern living spaces. You can choose from a range of one-bedroom and two-bedroom apartments with areas from 40 to 116 m², priced between €2,000 and €3,000 per m². All units are sold with high-quality finishing, a built-in kitchen, and modern plumbing, with fully furnished options available for an additional fee. Each apartment features spacious, well-designed interiors with open-plan living and dining areas, high-end finishes—including Italian ceramic tiles and parquet flooring—and expansive terraces (9 to 43 m²) with movable sun shades.

The apartments have premium features. Future owners will enjoy superior comfort with premium German sanitary ware, LG sprinkler air conditioning systems, and top-of-the-line wood and aluminum window systems that ensure excellent sound insulation and a comfortable microclimate year-round. All apartments come equipped with Internet, satellite TV, and IP telephony, ensuring a connected, modern lifestyle.

The River Side Complex is ideally located just a 5-minute walk (200 m) from a sandy beach along the clear, unspoiled Adriatic Sea—the least polluted in the Mediterranean. With approximately 300 sunny days a year and an average seasonal temperature of +23–26°C, the area is perfect for sea trips, beach vacations, and water activities. Residents can also enjoy an outdoor heated pool with a dedicated children’s area, a barbecue zone, lush green recreational spaces, and a children’s playground. A 60 m² fitness zone and medical-cosmetology treatment rooms further enhance your well-being.

The complex features round-the-clock video surveillance, an electronic access system, and comprehensive on-site management that handles everything from parking (underground parking for 39 cars available, with spaces priced between €12,000 and €15,000, plus additional open parking) to laundry facilities. Additional services include airport meet-and-greet arrangements and boat rides around the bay for residents.

Situated in Herceg Novi, the complex offers a perfect blend of tranquility and accessibility. It’s just 1.7 km from the center of Herceg Novi, 28 km (40 minutes) from Tivat International Airport, and 24 km (30 minutes) from Dubrovnik International Airport. Plus, the renowned Clinique “Igalo Institute,” famous for its healing mud baths and unique treatment programs, is conveniently nearby.

Experience a lifestyle that combines luxury, comfort, and natural beauty. Whether you are looking for a permanent residence or a seasonal retreat, River Side provides the perfect setting. Contact us today for more information or to arrange a viewing, and take the first step toward owning your dream home in this exclusive complex.

property_title: Studio apartment in River Side Complex
property_description:
Discover the ultimate in comfortable, upscale living at the River Side Complex—the only residential development in Igalo, Herceg Novi municipality, boasting its comprehensive infrastructure for a truly convenient lifestyle. Set in low-rise buildings that exude coziness and elegance, River Side offers an inviting atmosphere where you can relax with your family, enjoy a meal in an on-site café serving European and Mediterranean cuisine, and experience all the benefits of resort town living.

The complex offers modern living spaces. All units are sold with high-quality finishing, a built-in kitchen, and modern plumbing, with fully furnished options available for an additional fee. Each apartment features spacious, well-designed interiors with open-plan living and dining areas, high-end finishes—including Italian ceramic tiles and parquet flooring—and expansive terraces (9 to 43 m²) with movable sun shades.

The apartments have premium features. Future owners will enjoy superior comfort with premium German sanitary ware, LG sprinkler air conditioning systems, and top-of-the-line wood and aluminum window systems that ensure excellent sound insulation and a comfortable microclimate year-round. All apartments come equipped with Internet, satellite TV, and IP telephony, ensuring a connected, modern lifestyle.

The River Side Complex is ideally located just a 5-minute walk (200 m) from a sandy beach along the clear, unspoiled Adriatic Sea—the least polluted in the Mediterranean. With approximately 300 sunny days a year and an average seasonal temperature of +23–26°C, the area is perfect for sea trips, beach vacations, and water activities. Residents can also enjoy an outdoor heated pool with a dedicated children’s area, a barbecue zone, lush green recreational spaces, and a children’s playground. A 60 m² fitness zone and medical-cosmetology treatment rooms further enhance your well-being.

The complex features round-the-clock video surveillance, an electronic access system, and comprehensive on-site management that handles everything from parking (underground parking for 39 cars available, with spaces priced between €12,000 and €15,000, plus additional open parking) to laundry facilities. Additional services include airport meet-and-greet arrangements and boat rides around the bay for residents.

Situated in Herceg Novi, the complex offers a perfect blend of tranquility and accessibility. It’s just 1.7 km from the center of Herceg Novi, 28 km (40 minutes) from Tivat International Airport, and 24 km (30 minutes) from Dubrovnik International Airport. Plus, the renowned Clinique “Igalo Institute,” famous for its healing mud baths and unique treatment programs, is conveniently nearby.

Experience a lifestyle that combines luxury, comfort, and natural beauty. Whether you are looking for a permanent residence or a seasonal retreat, River Side provides the perfect setting. Contact us today for more information or to arrange a viewing, and take the first step toward owning your dream home in this exclusive complex.

property_title: Luxury Villa with Magnificent Sea View
property_description:
Discover coastal elegance in this exquisite luxury villa, ideally situated in Njivice at the entrance to Herceg Novi Bay. Renowned for its serene ambiance, Njivice offers a peaceful retreat where you can savor the majestic beauty of the Bay of Kotor. Enjoy stunning panoramic views of the Herceg Novi and Lustica peninsulas as this modern villa basks in the gentle morning sun and offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience.

Blending contemporary elegance with ultimate comfort, the villa features four spacious bedrooms—each showcasing breathtaking sea views—and four beautifully designed bathrooms that ensure privacy and luxury for both residents and guests. The thoughtful design makes this property an ideal family home or a sophisticated second residence.

At the Ground Level, an inviting entrance hall leads into a generous open-plan living room with a dining area and modern kitchen. A guest bathroom and a terrace with a private swimming pool create an ideal outdoor dining and summer gathering setting. On the First Floor are two master bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, ensuring privacy and comfort. On the Second Floor, two additional well-appointed bedrooms share a stylish bathroom and open onto a terrace with a breathtaking sea view. In the Basement, a technical room and garage provide practical support and secure parking.

This villa is constructed from the highest-quality materials with meticulous attention to detail, designed for ultimate comfort and luxury.

Set on a landscaped yard, the property is a true oasis. Poolside terraces provide enchanting views of the sea and the Bay of Kotor. Despite its peaceful, secluded setting, the villa is just a short drive from the beach and essential local amenities. This villa benefits from an exceptional location with easy access to international travel and luxury marinas. Tivat and Dubrovnik International Airport are within a 30 km radius. Additionally, the upscale marinas of Portonovi and Porto Montenegro are easily accessible, ensuring that luxury waterfront experiences are always at your fingertips.

This move-in-ready villa is your gateway to the ultimate Montenegrin coastal lifestyle. For more information or to schedule a viewing, don’t hesitate to get in touch with us. Your dream home awaits in this exquisite coastal retreat.

property_title: Modern Three-Bedroom Apartment in the STAR SERENITY residential complex
property_description:
This modern, newly built three-bedroom apartment is located in the Star Serenity residential complex in Kumbor, just a mere 6 km from Herceg Novi. The complex is in the embrace of the sun and sea, away from the city noise and bustle. This complex impresses with its peaceful atmosphere, stunning natural beauty, and crystal-clear water. Unspoiled beaches and panoramic views of the Bay of Kotor create ideal conditions for vacation and accommodation.

The development offers five different types of residential units in five buildings. Its original architecture is designed to meet the highest standards of luxury and comfort, with meticulously designed interiors, lush gardens, and spacious balconies and terraces overlooking the sea, providing maximum comfort and value for your stay.

A Star Serenity boasts a collection of exquisitely designed studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments. Each residence features open-plan living areas that maximize natural light and showcase captivating sea views. Expansive balconies and terraces create an indoor-outdoor flow, perfect for relaxation and entertainment. Apartments are equipped with smart home systems.

Parking spaces are available in the underground garage at €20,000 each.

There is a shared swimming pool with a sunbathing area, an on-site gym, a children’s playground, and designed social areas for BBQ parties and gatherings with family and friends. In A Star Serenity, you will always be able to feel the magic of the Mediterranean away from the city’s noise and bustle. The complex is close to the sea, city center, and historical and tourist places thanks to its central location. This makes the beauty of living in Montenegro a real privilege.

A Star Serenity presents a compelling investment opportunity. Montenegro’s booming tourism industry and increasing demand for luxury properties make your apartment a sound investment with high rental yields and capital appreciation potential. Contact us today for more information or to arrange a viewing. Experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and cultural richness in this Kumbor development.

property_title: Two Sea-View Villas with Pools in Budva Riviera
property_description:
Discover the epitome of Mediterranean living in these two beautiful small villas in Blizikuće, a prestigious village along the Budva Riviera, just moments from the famous Sveti Stefan island. Surrounded by some of Montenegro’s most breathtaking beaches and within easy reach of Budva’s diverse restaurants, shops, and entertainment, these villas offer an unmatched blend of luxury and convenience.

These villas offer three levels thoughtfully designed for comfort and functionality. The ground floor has an open-plan living and dining area, kitchen, guest toilet, direct access to the private swimming pool, and a technical room. On the first floor are two spacious bedrooms with a shared bathroom. On the second floor is a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a terrace boasting panoramic sea views.

Each villa has a private pool and one dedicated parking space, making it the ideal choice for a permanent residence, a vacation getaway, or a profitable rental property in one of Montenegro’s most sought-after locations.

Don’t miss the chance to own a piece of this Mediterranean paradise. Contact us today for more information or to schedule a viewing!

property_title: Modern Two-Bedroom Apartments in the STAR BAY Project
property_description:
Discover a new standard of upscale living in the STAR BAY Project, situated in the scenic Prčanj area of Kotor Municipality. Adjacent to the luxurious Porto Montenegro and within easy reach of UNESCO-protected Kotor, this prime location offers the perfect balance of convenience, culture, and opulence. With top international schools and major airports in Tivat, Podgorica, and Dubrovnik nearby, these one-bedroom apartments are ideally suited for both everyday living and vacation retreats.

Project STAR BAY has an exceptional location, close to Kotor’s elite landmarks and Porto Montenegro marina. It offers easy access to prestigious shopping, gourmet dining, and leisure facilities. This area of Kotor Bay is famous for its vibrant international community and year-round engagement.

The apartments have a luxurious living & design, with:

  • Open-plan living/dining area with seamless parquet flooring
  • Floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light
  • Smartly designed interiors optimizing function and style
  • Dropped ceilings and designer lighting for a modern, spacious feel
  • Warm, inviting bedroom space with parquet flooring
  • Hand-selected materials throughout, exuding understated luxury

property_title: Beautiful Sea-View Villas in Portofino Exclusive Complex
property_description:
Introducing a unique collection of 12 luxurious villas in scenic Kumbor, near the prestigious Porto Novi resort. Perfect for those seeking upscale coastal living, these residences combine modern design with tranquil surroundings, offering private gardens, roof terraces, and exceptional on-site amenities.

Nestled along the scenic Herceg Novi Riviera, Kumbor is known for its serene atmosphere, pristine beaches, and stunning views of the Bay of Kotor. This charming coastal village offers a delightful combination of Montenegrin tradition, fresh seafood cuisine, and easy access to nearby tourist hotspots. Located just a short drive from Herceg Novi, a town celebrated for its centuries-old fortresses and vibrant cultural scene, Kumbor serves as an excellent base for exploring the region’s rich history and breathtaking natural beauty.

Each villa boasts a spacious living room with a dining area, three bedrooms, a walk-in wardrobe, two bathrooms, and a large roof terrace overlooking the sea. During the early construction stages (2024–2025), buyers can personalize their interiors by selecting finishing materials such as wall colors, parquet, and ceramic tiles.

Available Three-Bedroom Villas:

  • Villa No. 9: 224m² total area (73m² terrace) | €950,000
  • Villa No. 10: 224m² total area (73m² terrace) | €900,000
  • Villa No. 11: 224m² total area (73m² terrace) | €900,000

All villas are equipped with a modern Smart Home system, which allows you to control curtains, air conditioning, underfloor heating, and video surveillance from your smartphone. An optional furniture package, priced at €65,000, is also available.

Residents can unwind in the heated infinity pool, while children enjoy the dedicated kids’ pool safely. Tennis enthusiasts will appreciate the on-site courts, which are perfect for friendly matches and skill development.

Experience the refreshing mountain and sea air blend while immersing yourself in panoramic bay views. The lush surroundings and captivating nature make this the perfect sanctuary for a peaceful yet luxurious lifestyle. If these beautiful modern villas catch your eye, contact us today for more information or to schedule a viewing.

property_description:

Within the complex, residents enjoy an array of amenities, including a pool, recreation area, sports courts, a children’s playground, a hammam, and a massage room. The ground floor is set amid a landscaped garden with palm trees, offering panoramic sea views and featuring two restaurants, a pastry shop, and a cocktail bar.

The apartments are bright, cozy, and furnished in a sleek, modern style using high-quality, eco-friendly materials. They are sold turnkey, with furniture, household appliances, textiles, and accessories. Built-in furniture uses glossy MDF; kitchen countertops are made of durable, wear-resistant DuPont Corian. Upholstered furniture is fire-resistant, easy to clean, and moisture-repellent. Each master bedroom has a king-size bed and blackout curtains, and the floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows in the living room showcase breathtaking views of the Adriatic Sea. The complex is secured with a video surveillance system, ensuring only authorized individuals can enter.

property_description:
Discover serene coastal living in Portofino Village, located in Kumbor, at the heart of the Herceg Novi Marine Riviera. Known for its peaceful atmosphere, Kumbor offers the perfect sanctuary from everyday bustle while showcasing the majestic beauty of the Bay of Kotor. Just 300 meters from the beach, this exceptional residential village combines tranquility, convenience, and breathtaking panoramic sea views.

A Luxurious Coastal Community: Portofino Village comprises five buildings with a total of 17 apartments and five penthouses, a spa and fitness center, and a swimming pool—all affording magnificent views of the Bay of Kotor. Each apartment features:

  • An open-plan living room, dining area, and kitchen
  • A master bedroom with a private bathroom and walk-in wardrobe
  • Two additional bedrooms, each with its bathroom
  • A spacious terrace to enjoy the stunning sea panorama

Penthouse apartments are duplexes and include a private rooftop terrace with a jacuzzi for the ultimate luxury experience.

Available Three-Bedroom Apartments:

  • Building 803 – 4: Area 115m² + 18.8m² terrace | Price: €480,000
  • Building 803 – 5 (Penthouse, Duplex): Area 144.7m² + 59.7m² terrace | Price: €700,000

  • Building 807 – 22 (Penthouse, Duplex): Area 155.5m² + 61.8m² terrace | Price: €850,000

Portofino Village apartments offer Premium Services and Amenities. Your maintenance costs cover a 24/7 concierge, on-site maintenance, a video surveillance system, a swimming pool, complimentary WiFi throughout the complex, parking services, and a shuttle to the Portonovi Yacht Marina. You can enjoy spa treatments, apartment cleaning, and food and drink delivery for an additional fee. Partner discounts are available for taxi and sea transfers, yacht charters, catering, and more.

Surrounding the complex are beaches with varying sand and pebble options, all boasting crystal-clear Adriatic waters and captivating Bay of Kotor views. The nearby marinas Porto Novi and Porto Montenegro offer services to meet the highest standards, while local Mediterranean and European restaurants cater to discerning tastes. At the cozy Fan Fani beach, reserved sun loungers await Portofino Village residents, complete with towels, sun protection, and thermal water. Refreshing drinks are easily accessible from the nearby restaurant, and a convenient transfer is provided.

property_title: One-bedroom apartments in AURA BUDVA building
property_description:
Aura Budva: Where Nature Meets Urban Convenience

Aura Budva is a prestigious residential complex situated in one of Budva’s most desirable locations. Surrounded by essential amenities that simplify everyday life and offer exceptional comfort, it is steps away from the new Mega Market shopping center, a high school, and the central bus station. Everything you need is right at your fingertips.

What makes Aura Budva genuinely unique is its setting, seamlessly combining tranquil green areas, forests, and nature with the conveniences of modern urban living. On one side, enjoy breathtaking views of natural landscapes; on the other, excellent road connections give you quick and easy access to every corner of Montenegro, making Aura Budva the perfect choice for anyone eager to explore the entire Montenegrin coastline.

Nearby, Topliški road leads to some of the finest viewpoints in Budva, where you can admire panoramic vistas of the sea and surrounding mountains. This route also provides easy access to popular spots for entertainment, recreation, and nightlife—close enough to enjoy at your leisure yet distant enough to ensure a peaceful, carefree atmosphere at home.

Aura Budva offers luxurious living space in an ideal location—close to nature while enjoying all the benefits of urban life. Each apartment is designed to provide the perfect blend of comfort and convenience, ensuring a lifestyle that meets the highest standards of modern living.

Budva, often hailed as the Queen of Mediterranean nightlife, dazzles visitors with its vibrant clubs, music festivals, and entertainment options that keep the energy high around the clock. Equally renowned for its stunning coastline, Budva’s beaches feature crystal-clear waters, soft sands, and captivating views, offering the perfect daytime retreat before the city’s lights come alive.

property_title: Poljana Olive Homes – Luxury Townhouses for Sale
property_description:
Welcome to Poljana Olive Homes, a collection of exquisite modern townhouses in the prestigious area of Reževići, along the stunning Budva Riviera, near the world-famous Sveti Stefan island. These townhouses offer an unparalleled Mediterranean lifestyle, combining luxury, comfort, and convenience in one of Montenegro’s prime locations.

Situated along the spectacular Budva Riviera, residents of Poljana Olive Homes enjoy the proximity to some of Montenegro’s most breathtaking beaches. With easy access to Budva’s wide range of amenities—including restaurants, shops, and entertainment—these townhouses promise a Mediterranean lifestyle like no other.

Each townhouse is thoughtfully designed to provide comfort and functionality, offering a total of 4 spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms across three floors and an attic. Key features include:

  • Private swimming pool and BBQ area, perfect for outdoor entertaining
  • Parking space for two cars
  • Energy-saving panoramic windows for breathtaking views
  • CCTV, intercom, and multi-split air conditioning for security and comfort
  • Natural stone façades, oak parquet flooring, and fine finishes throughout
  • Villeroy & Boch sanitary ware and modern plumbing for a touch of elegance
  • Energy-efficient systems, including a bioseptic and water purification system for the pool

The ground floor features an open-plan kitchen and living area with a terrace offering stunning sea views, while the first floor houses a master bedroom with a walk-in closet and a second en-suite bedroom with panoramic sea views.

The attic provides additional living space, with options for an extra bedroom, office, or wardrobe. The -1 floor includes a family room with a second kitchen, an additional bedroom with en-suite, and access to the pool and recreation area.

  • Solar panels

The Port of Mimosa is conveniently located, just a 45-minute drive from Tivat International Airport and 50 minutes from Dubrovnik International Airport. The luxurious Portonovi residential area and yacht marina are only a 15-minute walk away, while Porto Montenegro is accessible within a 45-minute drive.

Embrace the region’s natural beauty, enhanced by the 100-year-old olive trees that come with your villa, as you shape your dream home at Port of Mimosa. Book a live online tour today and experience the allure of Montenegro firsthand.

property_title: Sustainable living villas for sale, with magnificent sea views and swimming pool
property_description:
Situated in Tudorovici hill above Sv Stefan, one of the most picturesque parts of the Budva Riviera, the Villas are harmoniously nestled on a hill with breathtaking views of the Adriatic sea against mountains at the back. The villas offer sustainable living with high-quality, contemporary design supported by the latest sustainable technologies. Once completed, they will be the first carbon-natural residential properties in Montenegro.

Each villa has four levels. On the first level, a double-height living room, dining area, and modern kitchen are arranged in an open plan, seamlessly continuing to the outside terraces, infinity pool, and landscaped garden overlooking the Adriatic Sea. The second level consists of an entrance gallery with a sea view of the double-height living room, master bedroom with sea view, ensuite bathroom, walk-in changing room, and free-standing bath with sea view. On the third level, there are two double bedrooms with sea views, one single bedroom, and two bathrooms with mountain views. The plant room and large storage area are positioned at the top.

The villas are the first carbon-neutral buildings in Montenegro designed to the highest European standards. Villas photovoltaic panels generate electricity, and the energy surplus produced is returned to the grid, targeting zero energy bills. The latest innovative technologies have improved user experience and provided maximum energy efficiency. Features include:

▪ Photovoltaic solar panels producing 10k/W

▪ Passive house standard thermal insulation

▪ STO façade render system

▪ Triple glazing low-energy glass

▪ Underfloor heating by heat pumps

▪ High-efficiency cooling

▪ Heat recovery ventilation system

▪ Orientation to maximize exposure to the sun

▪ Orientation maximizing views & privacy

▪ Natural materials with anti-allergenic qualities

▪ Electrical car chargers

▪ Rainwater recycling

▪ Smart Home next-generation AI system

The project is part of the Good Earth Project’s mission to create habitats that excel in form and function. The villas incorporate integrated solutions for sustainable living without compromising on comfort and quality of the experience. They are equipped with amenities and features usually reserved for properties of the highest luxury in size and value. The amenities are harmoniously integrated to enhance the living experience without requiring extensive maintenance and upkeep. Features include:

▪ Terrace pergola with the sun, rain, and wind protection

▪ Infinity pools with seawater equipped with:

▪ No-chemical automatic filtering system

▪ Hydro massage

▪ Swim Jet counter current system

▪ High-pressure shower

▪ Garden automated irrigation system

▪ Car parking for two cars

▪ Free-standing bath with open views

▪ 6 meters high ceilings over the living room

▪ Smart house with AI control system

Two distinctive characters define the site context: the sea and the mountain. Located 250m above the sea and some 500m from the coastline, the site benefits from outstanding 180-degree views of the Adriatic Sea, with the island of Sveti Nikola in its background. To the northeast of the site, the peaks and ridges of the mountain Pastovska Gora form the backdrop. Postovska Gora is well known for its stunning trails and hikes.

Mediterranean cypresses were planted along the villas’ side façades, softening the modern structures. The landscaped gardens are additionally enriched with indigenous low-growing plants. Sculptural privacy panels along the border between the villas add to privacy and provide a fun, artistic feel. Trees and plants are chosen to survive the local environment with minimal maintenance and watering. A fully automated irrigation system using collected rainwater ensures the well-being of the landscaped gardens.

VILLA A, 227m², price 850.000€

Villa A has been fully completed externally, including the swimming pool. Services and utilities have been connected and brought inside the villa, ready to distribute inside the interior. Interior walls with service ducts and electrical conduits have been positioned and are prepared for fit-out and decoration. The buyer has an option to specify their interior. Alternatively, they can choose the same interior as the fully finished Villa B. The buyer can build the interiors themselves or engage the developer to finish.

VILLA B, 231m², price 1.150.000€

Villas B is fully finished; even the swimming pool is filled with water, ready for move-in. The interior designs combine a light and airy feel with the richness of textures and materials. Artisan features and highly sustainable technologies work hand in hand to support comfortable living. The sense of comfort is achieved by carefully positioning key sculptural forms: the stairs and central panel in patinated metal and the kitchen island in concrete. The quality of the materials and craftsmanship is celebrated in every detail. Through design elements and indoor greenery, the interior space embraces the beauty of nature and creates an ever-evolving interior.

Budva Riviera is the center of Montenegro’s tourism. It is best known for its Venetian architecture, historical monuments, sandy beaches, and diverse nightlife. The 38km long coast, with 17 beaches and turquoise waters, is one of the Mediterranean’s most striking stretches of coastline. Tudorovici, a quiet hill-side village, is located some 15 min drive from Budva and home to an easy-going international community. The area overlooks Sveti Stefan and the pristine Crvena Glavica beach. Just minutes away from the bustling crowds, unspoiled nature and rich vegetation surround the properties and provide a peaceful backdrop forperfect relaxation.

Discover the elegance and sophistication of this exclusive property –click here for a captivating video tourand experience its luxury firsthand.

property_title: Luxury 3-storey Villa with Infinity Pool and Panoramic Sea Views
property_description:
This exceptional villa in Reževići offers a peaceful Mediterranean lifestyle with breathtaking 180-degree views of the Adriatic Sea. Just 500 meters from the coast and surrounded by lush gardens, the property includes a stunning infinity pool with hydro-massage jets and a geyser effect. It’s the ideal blend of luxury and relaxation.

The villa consists of six spacious guest bedrooms, each with a private bathroom; the master bedroom has a sea-view whirlpool; the expansive living room with a fireplace, library/office, and children’s playroom; a modern kitchen with Juparana Colombo Rose granite and a separate dining area; six sea-view terraces; and a marble staircase with custom iron railings. Thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows, you get a direct, breathtaking sea view from each room with stunning sunsets among the pines and cypresses.

An additional studio apartment with an independent entrance, living/dining areas, kitchen, bathroom, and sea views is ideal for staff accommodation.

This remarkable villa combines premium appliances and exceptional finishes to deliver an unparalleled luxury experience. Built to the highest standards, it features a stone facade with full-stone corners and top-grade interior materials, including double showers, rain showers with massage jets, and select Villeroy & Boch fixtures alongside custom granite. The villa has a central air conditioning system, floor heating in every bathroom, and solar panels for water heating. A high-tech security system includes exterior video surveillance, interior motion detection, and a security alarm, while an eco-friendly, advanced bio-septic system offers autonomous wastewater treatment.

There is an infinity pool with heated water, remote temperature control, geyser, hydro-massage jets, and an automatic garden watering system, as well as five parking spaces (three fenced and two on the street).

Located in Reževići, between Sveti Stefan and Petrovac, the villa is surrounded by olive groves and near Drobni Pijesak Beach, listed among Europe’s best byThe Guardian. It offers tranquility, just a 15-minute drive from Budva’s vibrant city center.

Whether as a family retreat or a potential boutique hotel, this villa promises a luxurious Mediterranean lifestyle with stunning sunsets and a serene environment. Contact us today for more information or to arrange a viewing.

property_title: Charming Seaside Hotel for Sale
property_description:
Located in the heart of Herceg Novi, one of Montenegro’s most popular tourist destinations, this charming small hotel offers a unique investment opportunity. Herceg Novi, nestled at the entrance of the stunning Bay of Kotor, is known for its historic landmarks, vibrant culture, and reputation as a spa and wellness center. The town is home to iconic attractions like the Forte Mare Castle, the Austrian Clock Tower, and the Kanli Tower, making it a magnet for both history lovers and travelers seeking relaxation.

Perfectly positioned next to the seashore on Braće Grakalića Street, the hotel is just steps away from the scenic Pet Danica promenade. Guests are welcomed into an atmosphere of comfort and elegance, with 24 fully air-conditioned apartments offering breathtaking views of the sea and promenade.

The hotel’s apartments range from 30 to 50 m² and are thoughtfully designed to provide a relaxing retreat. Each unit has modern, high-quality furniture, a mini kitchen, an LCD TV, and bathrooms with sleek, modern showers. Cable and wireless internet are available, so guests can stay connected while enjoying their stay. Each room also boasts a private terrace, perfect for soaking in the stunning Adriatic views.

The hotel has amenities such as:

  • Private parking for 13 cars on the ground floor, offering convenience to hotel guests.
  • Only 10 meters from the sandy beach, providing immediate access to the sea’s beauty and the calming sounds of the waves.
  • A restaurant and kitchenette specializing in half-board accommodation, ensuring a delightful dining experience throughout the stay.

Herceg Novi is a bustling destination with excellent connectivity. The hotel is only 22 km from the luxury Porto Montenegro Marina and Tivat International Airport and 27 km from Dubrovnik Airport, providing easy access for international travelers.

Whether you’re looking to expand your hospitality portfolio or invest in a lucrative tourist hotspot, this seafront hotel is an opportunity you won’t want to miss. With its prime location, modern amenities, and stunning coastal views, it promises guests an unforgettable experience and provides you with an investment worth making.

Aura Budva offers luxurious living space in an ideal location—close to nature while enjoying all the benefits of urban life. Each apartment is designed to provide the perfect blend of comfort and convenience, ensuring a lifestyle that meets the highest standards of modern living.

Budva, often hailed as the Queen of Mediterranean nightlife, dazzles visitors with its vibrant clubs, music festivals, and entertainment options that keep the energy high around the clock. Equally renowned for its stunning coastline, Budva’s beaches feature crystal-clear waters, soft sands, and captivating views, offering the perfect daytime retreat before the city’s lights come alive.

The building features a garden with a swimming pool, perfect for a refreshing escape on hot summer days. On the first floor, residents can indulge in the SPA&Wellness Center, which offers a swimming pool, sauna, and Turkish bath for ultimate relaxation and recreation.

property_description:
Discover a new standard of living at Tivat Gardens, an eco-friendly residential area nestled in the beautiful surroundings of Tivat. This exceptional development combines privacy, peace, and urban sophistication and is located close to the airport and the prestigious Porto Montenegro yacht marina. Enjoy easy access to top restaurants, trendy bars, and world-class amenities within a stone’s throw while remaining tucked away from the busy tourist routes.

Tivat Gardens offers an idyllic lifestyle surrounded by nature’s splendor, paired with urban convenience. Designed with eco-consciousness in mind, the development promotes sustainability while providing modern luxury. The apartments are fully furnished with exclusive interior design by ANSER&Partners, ensuring a comfortable and lavish living experience.

  • Custom-designed furniture for each apartment.
  • Household appliances, including a dishwasher, stovetop, refrigerator, microwave, extractor hood, washing machine, and boiler.
  • Premium plumbing from Villeroy & Boch, Kartell, LAUFEN, or Dornbracht.

Residents of Tivat Gardens enjoy access to a wide range of high-end amenities, including:

  • LeGrand smart home system for seamless control of your home’s functions.
  • Samsung WindFree air conditioning system for year-round comfort.
  • Energy-efficient glazing and energy-saving engineering systems.
  • Spotlighting and LED lighting in all rooms for modern illumination.
  • A secure combination lock system for doors using cards, keys, or fingerprints.
  • KONE elevators adorned with Murano glass for a touch of elegance.
  • High-speed Internet throughout the complex.
  • A personal storage space in the underground level for each apartment.
  • 24/7 reception service and a robust security and video surveillance system.

Tivat Gardens is designed to cater to both your leisure and practical needs, offering residents a range of premium facilities:

  • Spa facilities, including a sauna, steam room, and private massage rooms for relaxation.
  • A fully-equipped gym for fitness enthusiasts.
  • A heated outdoor pool and a cozy lounge area with an open fireplace.
  • Barbecue area with gazebos and open fireplaces for al fresco dining.
  • A children’s playground for young residents to enjoy.
  • On-site beauty salon and cinema hall for added convenience and entertainment.
  • Meeting rooms for social and professional gatherings.
  • A charming café/bakery and grocery store to meet daily needs.
  • Spacious parking, garages, and additional storage spaces to free up apartment space.
