property_title: Modern Villas with Panoramic Sea Views in Green Hill
property_description:
Set amidst lush greenery and stunning panoramic views, these modern villas in the Green Hill development, located in the village of Kavač, Kotor municipality, are the epitome of luxury and eco-friendly living. With completion planned for 2025, this exclusive village comprises 34 homes designed for ultimate comfort and sustainability.

Each villa is part of a private residential area covering 23,000m² and offers an ideal living environment with picturesque views of both the sea and the city. The views are protected, ensuring no future construction will obstruct the scenery.

Prime Location: The development is conveniently located just 6 km from the center of both Tivat and Kotor, providing easy access to local amenities while being nestled in a tranquil, nature-rich setting.

There are two types of villas, C and D.

Type C boasts a spacious, two-floor layout: The first floor features an open kitchen, dining, and living area that opens onto a terrace with breathtaking sea and hill views, as well as a bathroom. The second floor offers three or four bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a terrace to enjoy the serene surroundings. Each of the C villas has a 400m2 plot. Avaliable C-type villas are:

  • C3, 176m2 with 400m2 plot, price 600.000€
  • C6, 176m2 with 487m2 plot, price 600.000€SOLD
  • C 10, 176m2 with 454m2 plot, price 595.500€SOLD

Type D is larger and has a spacious, three-floor layout. It has a custom ground floor, kitchen, and living room, three or four bedrooms, three bathrooms, and two terraces with a beautiful panoramic view.

Avaliable D-type villas are:

  • C14, 236m2 with 1067m2 plot, price 787.500€
  • C15, 236m2 with 1067m2 plot, price 787.500€SOLD

Designed with a contemporary Mediterranean style and modern aesthetic, these villas are constructed using premium sustainable materials. The energy-efficient features include:

  • PIR insulation for year-round comfort, which is four times more effective than standard insulation, and PIR panels to provide top-notch ecological safety, both non-combustible and highly energy-efficient.
  • Two-chamber double-glazed windows designed for durability and enhanced energy efficiency. These windows, often used in skyscrapers, are virtually unbreakable, keep homes warm in winter, cool in summer, and do not fog up.
  • Sophisticated air conditioning and ventilation systems that ensure optimal temperature control, with inverter air conditioning units offering advanced climate management.
  • Lightweight, seismic-resistant construction that ensures safety and durability.

The price of the townhouses includes high-quality finishes, such as:

  • Parquet/laminate/ceramic tiling, with walls and ceilings painted in your choice of color.
  • Complete exterior finishes, including facades, roofs, and drainage.
  • Fully equipped bathrooms with ceramic tiles and modern sanitary ware.
  • Landscaping: A terrace in front of the house, parking, and walkways, with lawns and hedges around the property.

For those seeking additional luxury, investors offer a range of options for an extra cost, including:

  • Swimming pool installation.
  • Fitness and wellness facilities.
  • Additional walkways and stoneworks.
  • “Turn-key” full furniture options with a professional design team.

Whether you’re looking for a modern family home or a peaceful retreat, these villas offer a perfect balance of luxury, sustainability, and natural beauty. With a warm, energy-efficient design, premium finishes, and stunning surroundings, Green Hill is a community designed for year-round living.

property_title: First-Line Small Hotel “Castello di Boka” for Sale
property_description:
Nestled on the first line of the sea in the picturesque village of Stoliv, this charming small hotel offers an unparalleled opportunity for investment in Kotor Bay, one of Montenegro’s most coveted coastal locations. Stoliv is a tranquil, peaceful village, yet it is conveniently close to historical sites, cultural landmarks, and natural attractions, making it an ideal destination for tourists seeking both relaxation and adventure.

This seafront hotel offers spectacular views of the bay from each of its 26 rooms, offering the perfect backdrop for a peaceful retreat. The hotel also features a private beach, ensuring guests can enjoy the crystal-clear waters of the Adriatic just steps from their rooms.

The hotel is designed to accommodate 60 to 70 guests across its 26 guest rooms, including ten triple, twelve double, and four rooms. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower, a TV, a refrigerator, and a terrace offering panoramic sea views. The hotel also includes three staff rooms on the sixth floor to ensure smooth operations.

Extensive Facilities

  • A restaurant with seating for 60 guests provides an excellent dining experience, while a lounge bar offers a cozy spot to unwind.
  • The hotel’s conference room, which can accommodate 120 people, is perfect for business retreats, events, or corporate meetings.
  • A well-equipped kitchen supports the restaurant and bar, ensuring smooth service.

Key Features

  • Private beach for hotel guests
  • On-site parking
  • Located in a quiet, peaceful area but close to major attractions, just 8 km from Kotor Old Town and 10 km from Porto Montenegro Marina

In addition to the hotel’s idyllic setting, guests can access a range of nearby historical monuments, islands, monasteries, lakes, and more, all within a 5 to 30-minute reach. The blend of serene surroundings and proximity to Montenegro’s famous cultural landmarks ensures this hotel appeals to many travelers.

With its prime location, modern amenities, and growth potential, Hotel Castello is an excellent opportunity for those looking to invest in the thriving tourism industry of Montenegro’s Kotor Bay.

Contact us for more details and to schedule a viewing of this unique property.

property_title: Exquisite penthouse living with a magnificent sea view and private pool in the heart of Boka Bay
property_description:
Welcome to your sanctuary in the heart of Dobrota, where luxury meets coastal charm. Nestled within the esteemed “Saint Matthew Place” building, this exquisite penthouse on the third floor offers a refined living experience with unparalleled views of the majestic Boka Bay.

This impressive 192m² penthouse features a meticulously designed layout comprising three bedrooms, a bathroom, and a guest toilet. The open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area create an inviting space for relaxation and entertainment, ideal for intimate gatherings and lavish events. Ascend to the rooftop terrace to discover your own private oasis. A sprawling 33m² terrace awaits, accompanied by a refreshing 41m² swimming pool. Immerse yourself in panoramic vistas of the bay, offering the perfect backdrop for moments of leisure and enjoyment. The apartment is unfurnished for sale, allowing you, as the future owner, to tailor the space to your unique style and preferences.

Parking and garage space are included in the price of the apartment, providing convenience and security for your vehicles.

Dobrota is renowned as one of Kotor’s premier residential areas, offering a harmonious blend of natural beauty and urban convenience. Stretching along the scenic coastline, this picturesque village is adorned with citrus and olive trees, exuding a welcoming ambiance for residents and visitors alike. The beach zone, about 7km long, runs along the whole village and consists of concrete and pebble areas. The place has various small shops, cafes, bars, and restaurants.

Enjoy seamless connectivity from Dobrota to the historic Old Town of Kotor, just a brief 5-minute drive away. Additionally, the proximity to Tivat Airport (17km) and Porto Montenegro marina ensures easy access to global destinations and world-class amenities.

If you’re searching for modern elegance and coastal living, this exceptional penthouse in Dobrota is the epitome of luxury. With its contemporary design, panoramic vistas, and endless possibilities for personalization, it offers an unparalleled opportunity to craft your dream lifestyle in the heart of Kotor.

Contact us today to learn more about this captivating property and begin envisioning your life in paradise.

property_title: Apartment for sale with a beautiful seaview
property_description:
This one-bedroom apartment for sale is located in Tivat, in the modern residential building “Ksenija” in Porto Montenegro. Porto Montenegro combines a spectacular lifestyle destination with a world-class, full-service marina and luxury residential village offering premium real estate for sale and rental in this part of the Mediterranean. Thanks to the Porto Montenegro residential area and marina, Tivat is a prime location to reside in year-round, and the center of nightlife and important events.

This one-bedroom apartment of 77m² is on the second floor of the building “Ksenija”. It consists of a living room with a dining area and a kitchen, one bedroom, a bathroom and toilet, a hallway, and a terrace.

The apartment is for sale fully furnished. It is equipped in a simple modern style, with all the necessary appliances and central air conditioning. Probably the most beautiful part of this apartment is the big terrace. The terrace offers an enchanting view of the Tivat part of the Boka Bay and the courtyard of the building, all in greenery and with a magnificent infinity pool available to the apartment owners. Given the Mediterranean climate that prevails in Tivat, you can enjoy this view all year round by hanging out there with family and friends.

Settled in a peaceful and quiet neighborhood, close to the sea, and in the nearby vicinity of all necessary amenities (ATM, pharmacy, hairdresser, day spa, grocery shop) this apartment offers great rental potential and is an excellent investment opportunity. The boulevards of the Porto Montenegro marina village bring open-air waterfront shopping designed to create an intimate and cosmopolitan environment, ideal for a relaxing evening stroll with leisurely shopping and fine dining opportunities.

Porto Montenegro marina village is located at the heart of town, only 3km away from the international airport Tivat. From your apartment to the Old Town Kotor which is under UNESCO protection is less than 12km. The capital of Montenegro and airport Podgorica are only 85km away.

We believe that this modern apartment in the luxury Porto Montenegro marina village won’t be long on the market, so if you like it, feel free to contact us for more information.

property_title: One-bedroom apartment in Rhizon Trinity
property_description:
Embark on a modern elegance and unparalleled comfort journey with the exquisite “Rhizon Trinity” residential complex in Risan, nestled within the captivating Bay of Kotor in the Kotor municipality. Immerse yourself in the rich history and allure of Risan, one of the oldest settlements in the Bay of Kotor, known for its Illyrian state’s legacy as a craft, maritime, and trade center. This ancient town, a haven for history and archaeology enthusiasts, welcomes a new era of sophisticated living with the contemporary “Rhizon Trinity” residential complex.

Situated in a pristine natural setting in hills above the sea, offering breathtaking views of the Montenegrin coast’s most beautiful bay, “Rhizon Trinity” comprises three residential buildings, each spanning the ground floor, first floor, and loft (attic). The expansive 2,240m² plot hosts these buildings, complemented by a convenient parking lot. The complex effortlessly merges modern living with the tranquility of nature, creating an ideal haven for comfortable and luxurious living.

The façades of the buildings exhibit a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity, featuring stone cladding on the first floor and wooden slats framing dormers and terraces. This combination lends a welcoming touch to the complex, ensuring a warm and inviting ambiance. The “Rhizon Trinity” complex is a testament to quality and functionality, boasting modern technical equipment with full automation possibilities. The use of high-quality materials and surface treatments, coupled with preserved green areas, adds to the allure of this exclusive residence.

Explore the amenities that “Rhizon Trinity” offers, including a swimming pool, sauna, smart home system, children’s corner, and more, providing residents with a luxurious living experience. The complex features a joint modern reception on the first floor, creating community among its residents.

The apartments within the complex are designed with energy efficiency in mind, featuring a smart home system that allows centralized control and automation of various parameters. With four flats on each floor, the optimal ratio ensures privacy and tranquility for residents. The “open space” concept unites the living room, dining room, and kitchen, creating a spacious and modern living environment.

Enjoy the maximally landscaped courtyard with facilities for all age groups, enhancing the quality of life within the complex. A dedicated SPA&Wellness center with an exclusive swimming pool and sauna awaits residents in front of the complex. Additional amenities include seating areas and a children’s playground equipped with various entertainment, ensuring a comfortable and pleasant life within the complex.

property_title: One-bedroom apartment in “Torre a Cona” residential building
property_description:
Welcome to the epitome of modern living in the heart of Sutomore! Nestled within the renowned “Torre a Cona” residential building in the Bar municipality, these contemporary one-bedroom apartments redefine luxury and comfort. Sutomore, celebrated for its 1.6km stretch of sandy beach and crystal-clear blue waters, now hosts a residential gem that combines convenience, style, and sophistication effortlessly.

Situated on a 1,170m2 plot along the main road connecting Bar and Podgorica, the “Torre a Cona” building stands out with its Mediterranean architectural flair. Boasting a basement garage and four floors, this residence is a harmonious blend of form and function. The façade, adorned with stone cladding and an architecturally recessed top floor, imparts a unique charm, making it a distinctive presence in the surroundings.

Inside, the apartments reflect a commitment to modern living. Designed to cater to the evolving preferences of discerning clients, these spaces feature simple lines, noble materials, and warm parquet colors. The interiors exude sophistication and charm, surprising residents with an elegant ambiance. Moreover, each apartment has a smart home system catering to those who expect nothing less than cutting-edge technology in their living spaces.

The building’s thoughtful design extends to shared amenities, including a reception hall at the entrance and 24-hour maintenance services. The eight one-bedroom apartments, two on each floor, are meticulously crafted to include a living room, hallway, kitchen, and a separate bedroom with a bathroom. The top-floor apartments boast access to a stunning roof terrace, complete with a jacuzzi, wooden partitions, and lush greenery—a perfect oasis for relaxation.

The building features a garden with a swimming pool for a refreshing escape on hot summer days. On the first floor, residents can indulge in the SPA&Wellness Center, offering a swimming pool, sauna, and Turkish bath for ultimate relaxation and recreation.

Discover the available one-bedroom apartments, each offering a unique blend of space and style:

  • A1, ground floor, 55.52m² + terrace 23.55m², PRICE 167,902,00€

  • A8, second floor, 55.52m², price 144,352,00€

Conveniently located just 38km from Podgorica International Airport and 55km from Tivat International Airport and Porto Montenegro, these apartments offer accessibility to both local and international destinations.

Contact us for additional information on this spacious and well-positioned property. Elevate your lifestyle with the unparalleled charm of the “Torre a Cona” apartments in Sutomore.

property_title: First-line stone villa for sale
property_description:
This first-line stonevilla for sale in Prcanjhas a beautiful view of Boka Bay and the surrounding mountains. Prčanj is a small town along theBay of Kotor, opposite Dobrota, and between Muo and Stoliv, only 5km from the Old Town of Kotor. The Prčanj’s waterfront consists of a long line of stone villas, unified by their beautiful facades and separated by gardens and olive orchards. Due to its favorable geographical position, Prcanj has a pleasant climate and is known as a natural climatic health resort especially suitable for people with respiratory issues.

This 112m² villa has three levels. On the ground floor (38m²) are the kitchen and the living room, with high ceilings and windows with a panoramic view of the bay. There is also a  pantry and technical room (Video surveillance, air conditioning, video intercom, WIFI, fire, and security protection). The second level consists of a large entry hall with three bedrooms, bathrooms, and with small kitchen and saloon with a handmade fireplace. On the third level, there is a master penthouse bedroom with a bathroom, with a sea-view terrace.

The villa is fully furnished for sale. House is under video surveillance, CCTV cameras system monitors and records at a 30-day interval. Floors are covered with Terracotta on the ground floor and with solid oak wood on the other levels. First-quality Italian ceramics are in the bathrooms. There are electric convector heaters installed for heating. There is access to KLEEMANN brand panoramic hydraulic passenger lift through the stairhead. Wooden security doors and window shutters are on the ground floor.

In the 565m² backyards, there is a water well (300+ years old),  various fruit trees and plants customized to the garden, a small storage room, and a 64m² pergola (40m² with roof and 24m² is open). This garden is a perfect quiet paradise for your family and friends’ gatherings and celebrations. There is an underground irrigation system installed in the garden controlled by the HUNTER brand of USA. To protect the environment, the house’s old and traditional septic system has been replaced with a BIO-SEPTIC system imported from Italy.

In front of the villa, there is a 56sqm customized pontoon available. On the pontoon, there are two parking spaces. Rattan furniture (glass/rattan table and four rattan chairs) is available for breakfast, lunch, and dining at the pontoon. Pontoon features a 3x3m square movable shade available. The pontoon is equipped with a Spanish-made stainless steel pool-type ladder easing sea access. Also, 56m² of the sea in front of the pontoon is cleaned of seaweeds, then completely covered with 0-4mm white sand to ease the people swimming comfortably. The pontoon and car parking area is being monitored with a CCTV camera.

Settled in a peaceful and quiet area with a beautiful view and the nearby vicinity of all necessary amenities, this villa offers great potential and is an excellent investment opportunity. It offers a dream combination, and a peaceful environment, while also being close to the Tivat airport (10km), the luxurious marina of Porto Montenegro (12km), and the beautiful Old Town of Kotor (6km).

To find out more information about this property, don’t hesitate to get in touch with us.

property_title: One-bedroom apartments for sale near golf course  – Lustica Bay Peaks
property_description:
These beautiful one-bedroom apartments are located in the Lustica Bay residential area, “The Peaks,” in Tivat municipality. Lustica Bay is a dreamy spot uniting old-world charm with upscale facilities designed to reflect the tenor of traditional fishing villages of Montenegro. It offers stunning, expansive views of the surrounding landscape, nurturing a carefree ambiance and lifestyle.

“The Peaks” is an exclusive new hillside golf neighborhood. Secluded yet connected to the lifestyle and community of the resort of Lustica Bay, “The Peaks” provides a spirit-lifting setting for Montenegro’s first world-class golf experience and contemporary living in architecturally stunning homes.

“Botanika” spacious one-bedroom apartment overlooking golf holes 1 and 2 and the Adriatic Sea. They consist of open-plan living and dining areas, one bedroom with a bathroom, a guest toilet, and a beautiful terrace with a magnificent sea view. Owners have access to the neighborhood pool and Guvno – seating area. Inside is a bespoke custom-made kitchen with Miele appliances (or a similar international brand), porcelain tiles in stone, and a terrazzo effect. Upgrades include bespoke wood veneer wardrobes, high-quality parquet flooring, additional Miele appliances, branded fittings, sanitary ware, and a towel heater. There are Neighborhood parking lots.

Avaliable one-bedroom apartments:

  • GA403 – 105.45m², 738.000€
  • GA406– 105.17m², 799.000€

As a homeowner at Lustica Bay, you are buying much more than a home; you will be a part of Lustica Bay’s exclusive lifestyle. The architecture of Lustica Bay blends harmoniously with nature and respects Montenegro’s cultural roots while offering inspired contemporary design and functionality. Each neighborhood has its character and is rich with premium lifestyle offerings and amenities, making Lustica Bay the perfect destination for investing.

Lustica Bay is in the sweeping Lustica Peninsula, between the stunning Bay of Kotor entrance and the Adriatic Sea. It is a gateway to the treasures that Montenegro has to offer. There are three international airports nearby: Tivat (10km), only a 15-minute drive away; Podgorica, Montenegro’s capital (90km); and Cilipi, a short drive from Croatia’s coastal town of Dubrovnik (46km). All three airports operate scheduled and charter flights with additional facilities for private aircraft. With direct European connections, Lustica Bay is within a three-hour flight from most European cities.

Indulge in the ultimate seaside living experience and make this beautiful apartment with a breathtaking sea view yours! Contact us for more information.

property_title: Three-bedroom villas for sale
property_description:
Nestled in the picturesque hills above the Adriatic Sea, “Olive Village” is a harmonious enclave of modern living, offering eight exquisite three-bedroom villas for sale in the serene Podi area of Herceg Novi. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature, surrounded by a grove of olive trees, as you explore these thoughtfully designed homes that seamlessly blend contemporary style with the tranquility of their surroundings.

Herceg Novi is one of the major Montenegrin tourist destinations, located at the entrance to the Bay of Boka. It is well known as a spa and health center, famous for its tourist attractions – castle Forte Mare, built in 1382, a clock tower built by Austrians in the 19th century, and the Kanli tower built by Turks.

Just 3km from the bustling center of Herceg Novi, in the Podi area, “Olive Village” is strategically located for convenience and seclusion. The villas offer easy access to the beach, a five-kilometer embankment, the Porto Novi residential area yacht marina, supermarkets, restaurants, schools, kindergartens, and other essential infrastructure facilities.

Each villa has functional planning solutions, modern energy-saving systems, and private plots from 500m2 to 1200m2. There are two distinct villa types, each offering a unique living experience.

Type A: On the ground floor, there is an open space living room with a kitchen and dining place, one bedroom with a bathroom, laundry room, and a hallway. On the first floor is a master bedroom with a bathroom and a guest bedroom with a bathroom. The total living area of this type of villa is 128m².

Avaliable villas:

  • A9, 128m², plot 521m², garden view, 590.000€
  • A8, 128m², plot 528m², sea view, 620.000€

Type B: On the ground floor, there is an open space living room with a kitchen and dining place, one bedroom with a bathroom, pastry, and a hallway. On the first floor is a master bedroom with a bathroom, wardrobe, and a guest bedroom with a bathroom. The total living area of this type of villa is 140m².

Avaliable villas:

  • B10, 140m², plot 499m², garden view, 590.000€
  • B11, 140m², plot 616m², garden view, 590.000€

All villas are equipped with modern energy-saving systems for cooling and heating, ensuring comfort and sustainability. Enjoy the advantage of no real estate turnover tax upon purchase, as the sale occurs directly from the developer. Estimated annual ownership costs are approximately €300.

“Olive Village” offers a breathtaking panoramic view over the Bay of Boka’s entrance. It is conveniently situated in the hills near Herceg Novi, just 34km from the international airport in Dubrovnik (Croatia) and less than 25km from Tivat Airport and Porto Montenegro Yacht Marina. The famous residential area and marine Porto Novi is a mere 8km from “Olive Village.”

Experience the epitome of modern living in the embrace of nature. “Olive Village” invites you to explore a life of tranquility, convenience, and sophistication. If this unique opportunity captivates you, contact us for more information and embark on a journey to call one of these villas your own.

property_title: Two-bedroom duplex apartment in Boka Place
property_description:
This luxurious, two-bedroom duplex apartment for sale is in the Mistral building, part of Boka Place, Tivat. Boka Place is a pioneering mixed-use development within Porto Montenegro, overlooking the world’s first Platinum-rated marina. It serves as a vibrant community hub, embodying transformative wellness, urban living, and a diverse gathering of families and friends, all united in their pursuit of a life well-lived.

Boka Place is designed as a new urban district within Porto Montenegro, a commercial and residential center with shops, cafes, a cinema, a hotel and wellness center, green open spaces, galleries, world fashion brands, and private residences. Nestled beside the stunning Boka Bay, this complex comprises 213 luxury apartments, the renowned 5-star Kerzner International Hotel SIRO, and an array of retail, leisure, and gastronomy units. The residences are intelligently designed to offer both function and beauty.

The apartment has an area of ​​146m² on two levels. The first floor features an open-plan layout encompassing a spacious living room, kitchen, an elegant dining area, and guest toilet. Upstairs are two generously sized bedrooms with bathrooms and a terrace offering breathtaking views. The apartment also has a garden of 34m², with an exclusive right of use. A furniture pack is available to further elevate the comfort and style of this exceptional home. A garage space is available for an additional fee of 30,000 euros.

Residents of this SIRO-managed apartment can enjoy exclusive access to the amenities of the Recovery Labs rooftop pool and bar. They also benefit from hotel-like services, including concierge assistance, in-room hospitality, and entertainment. Boka Place Residences offers participation in the SIRO rental program, which gives you an excellent investment opportunity.

Porto Montenegro Marina Village and Boka Place are located at the heart of the town of Tivat, only 3km away from the international airport. From these apartments to the Old Town Kotor, which is under UNESCO protection, is less than 12km. The capital of Montenegro and the airport Podgorica are only 85km away.

With a bayside location sheltered by the neighboring mountains, this bespoke apartment offers contemporary design and intimate waterfront living with great rental potential and is an excellent investment opportunity. If you like it, feel free to contact us for more information.

property_title: Remarkable three-bedroom penthouse for sale in the heart of Porto Montenegro
property_description:
Welcome to the epitome of luxury living in Porto Montenegro’s modern residence, “ELENA.” This extraordinary three-bedroom penthouse is a true gem, offering an unparalleled lifestyle experience in the picturesque coastal town of Tivat. Nestled within the exclusive Porto Montenegro community, this property seamlessly combines world-class amenities, a full-service marina, and opulent residential living.

Location is key, and “ELENA” enjoys a prime spot on the central boulevard, ideally situated between the serene bay and the majestic neighboring mountains. This unique setting provides breathtaking views, easy access to the bay, and a vibrant array of on-site retail and dining options. As a resident, you’ll be privileged to enjoy 24/7 reception and concierge services, facility management, top-tier security, an exclusive swimming pool, a state-of-the-art gym, and much more. Parking place in a private garage is included in the price of the apartment.

The penthouse itself is a masterpiece of modern design and sophistication. The open-plan living room seamlessly flows into a dining area and a well-appointed kitchen, creating an inviting space for relaxation and entertainment. Three spacious bedrooms, each with its en-suite bathroom, offer luxurious comfort and privacy. Moreover, multiple terraces provide sweeping vistas of the sea, the charming boulevard, and the majestic mountains surrounding you. Ascend to the second level to discover a private terrace adorned with a sparkling swimming pool – a perfect haven for family gatherings and soirées with friends.

The penthouse has a fully equipped kitchen, but it can also be purchased fully furnished. Inspired by the allure of the Italian Riviera, the interior design combines modern comfort with a touch of refined elegance. Landscaped terraces complement the living spaces, creating a harmonious and abundant Mediterranean retreat. High ceilings and retractable glass doors usher in great natural light, creating a bright and airy ambiance. The expansive terraces offer endless opportunities for outdoor relaxation and entertainment.

property_title: Two-level apartment in MOUNTAIN RETREAT BY DUKLEY
property_description:
These stunning luxurious three-bedroom apartments are part of the “Mountain Retreat by Dukley” – a premium class complex with ten chalets that present the ultimate fusion of nature’s magnificence, exceptional craftsmanship, and an abundance of luxurious features that offer unparalleled lifestyle and experience. The complex is situated in the North of Montenegro, at the foot of Mount Bjelasica, 1200 meters above sea level, between the Kolašin town and the «Kolašin 1450» ski center.

With a spacious living room, a dining room with a kitchen, three bedrooms with bathrooms, and a private garden, this residence offers an abundance of space for both relaxation and entertainment. This mountain sanctuary is completed with the indulgence of a private sauna, offering a rejuvenating escape to restore the mind, body, and soul. Two beautiful terraces allow you to enjoy the greenery and wood surrounding the chalets. A heartwarming atmosphere is created with natural materials, combining the beauty of wood and other organic elements.

All the apartments in chalets are sold finished, and the basic package includes an elegant style interior design. As future owners, you can experience a true mountain escape where the cozy and inviting interior mirrors the awe-inspiring landscape, ensuring a harmonious retreat. Professional furnishing assistance is available for future owners upon request. All chalets are sustainably built. A smart home system is implemented.

Mountain Retreat by Dukley combines high-quality construction with a high level of service. A management company with extensive experience in Dukley Gardens and Dukley Residences projects offers professional concierge service and 24/7 security.

Avaliable units:

  • Chalet 3 – Layout 3A1 – 124,07m2
  • Chalet 3 – Layout 3A2 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 4 – Layout 4A1 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 4 – Layout 4A2 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 5 – Layout 5A1 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 5 – Layout 5A2 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 6 – Layout 6A1 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 6 – Layout 6A2 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 7 – Layout 7A1 – 127,39m2
  • Chalet 7 – Layout 7A2 – 127,39m2

The complex is located on the southern slope of Mount Bjelasica in the protected area of the Biogradska Gora National Park and is surrounded by mountains and coniferous forests. It is only 5 minutes from Kolašin 1450 ski center and 30 minutes from National Park Biogradska Gora. Airport Podgorica is less than one hour drive from there.

Idyllic location in pristine nature guarantees you privacy and seclusion. Many attractions are available to active leisure enthusiasts, like hiking, trekking, mountain biking, rafting, kayaking, winter sports activities, ethnic tourism, wine-tasting, and gastro tours.

By investing in the Mountain Retreat by Dukley project, you receive a guaranteed annual income of 8% of the invested funds per year within the first three years.

property_title: Spectacular Trio of Villas with Breathtaking Sea View for sale
property_description:
Nestled the top the serene hill overlooking the renowned Mogren beach in Budva, we proudly present an exceptional complex of three contemporary villas, now available for purchase. These exquisite properties offer a harmonious blend of architectural innovation, luxurious amenities, and awe-inspiring landscapes.

This captivating complex is ingeniously divided into three blocks, artfully arranged to maximize visual appeal and functionality. Villas A and B stand gracefully side by side. At the same time, Villa C integrates into the terrain below, its flat roof terrace seamlessly merging with the expansive space before the upper villas, adorned with an enticing built-in swimming pool. The well-organized north-side entrances are connected by elegant stairs and passages, leading to a shared plateau and a parking area accessed through a convenient ramp.

Each villa has four levels and a captivating array of spaces designed to elevate your living experience. The basement of Villas A and B is a haven of relaxation and entertainment, boasting a chic bar with a minibar and a wine shop, a state-of-the-art cinema hall, and a billiards corner. This level also houses three comfortable rooms, two bathrooms, a rejuvenating sauna, and a technical room equipped with a central boiler to ensure a steady hot water supply. The first level connects directly to the pool plateau or through an internal staircase from the ground floor, perfect for mornings of tranquility.

The ground floor showcases a spacious, open-concept layout, artfully divided into distinct sections – a lavish living room, a stylish dining area, and a contemporary kitchen. Beyond lies a generously proportioned covered terrace, enveloped by a glass enclosure that grants uninterrupted vistas of the captivating sea. The first floor of each villa comprises two bedrooms, seamlessly linked by a walk-in wardrobe. The master suite boasts a private bathroom and a wardrobe, complemented by a personal terrace. The second bedroom features an en-suite bathroom and a fully glazed seaward-facing wall, inviting the scenic beauty indoors.

Villa C’s basement hosts a well-equipped gym, a sauna, a shower area, and a technical room, mirroring the opulence of Villas A and B. The first floor of Villa C offers three sumptuous rooms, each with a private terrace, bathroom, and wardrobe. A connecting corridor leads to a covered terrace featuring a hydromassage tub, with an external staircase ascending to the expansive roof terrace and pool nestled within the basement of Villas A and B.

For your convenience, a service apartment is thoughtfully positioned on the basement level of Villas A and B. This apartment exudes sophistication and coziness, housing a bedroom, a wardrobe, a living room, a dining area, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a bathroom.

This trio of villas is offered fully furnished, meticulously adorned in a contemporary style enriched with warm, inviting elements reminiscent of a cherished family home. Each villa features an electric fireplace and central ceiling cassette air conditioners for ultimate comfort. Modern amenities extend to telephone, internet, intercom, and video surveillance connections, accessible via Wi-Fi for seamless control.

If your dreams encompass a coastal haven that harmoniously marries spectacular sea and mountain vistas with refined luxury, this extraordinary complex beckons as an exceptional choice. Evoke a lifestyle of indulgence and tranquility by owning a piece of this Montenegrin masterpiece. Contact us today to embark on a journey toward unparalleled elegance and serenity. Your vision of coastal living awaits within the embrace of these splendid villas.

property_title: Two-bedroom apartments for sale near golf course  – Lustica Bay Peaks
property_description:
These beautiful two-bedroom apartments are located in Lustica Bay residential area, “The Peaks,” in Tivat municipality. Lustica Bay is a dreamy spot uniting old-world charm with upscale facilities designed to reflect the tenor of traditional fishing villages of Montenegro. It offers stunning, expansive views of the surrounding landscape, nurturing a carefree ambiance and lifestyle.

“The Peaks” is an exclusive new hillside golf neighborhood. Secluded yet connected to the lifestyle and community of the resort of Lustica Bay, “The Peaks” provides a spirit-lifting setting for Montenegro’s first world-class golf experience and contemporary living in architecturally stunning homes.

“Botanika” 2-bedroom spacious apartments overlooking Golf holes 1 and 2 and the Adriatic sea. They consist of open-plan living and dining areas, two bedrooms with a bathroom, and a beautiful terrace with a magnificent sea view. Owners have access to the neighborhood pool and Guvno – seating area. Inside there is a bespoke custom-made kitchen with Miele appliances (or a similar international brand), with porcelain tiles in stone and a terrazzo effect. Upgrades include bespoke wood veneer wardrobes, high-quality parquet flooring, additional Miele appliances, branded fittings, sanitary ware, and a towel heater. There are Neighborhood parking lots.

Avaliable two-bedroom apartments:

  • GA504 – 123.16m², 1.016.000€SOLD
  • GA511 – 139.07m², 1.126.500€
  • GA512 – 116.60m², 933.000€SOLD
  • GA522 – 142.99m², 1.215.500€

As a homeowner at Lustica Bay, you are buying much more than a home; you will be a part of Lustica Bay’s exclusive lifestyle. The architecture of Lustica Bay blends harmoniously with nature and respects Montenegro’s cultural roots while offering inspired contemporary design and functionality. Each neighborhood has its character and is rich with premium lifestyle offerings and amenities, making Lustica Bay the perfect destination for investing.

Lustica Bay is nestled in the sweeping Lustica Peninsula, poised between the stunning Bay of Kotor entrance and the Adriatic Sea. It is a gateway to the treasures that Montenegro has to offer. There are three international airports nearby; Tivat (10km), only a 15-minute drive away; Podgorica, Montenegro’s capital (90km); and Cilipi, a short drive from Croatia’s coastal town of Dubrovnik (46km). All three airports operate scheduled and charter flights with additional facilities for private aircraft. With direct European connections, Lustica Bay is within a three-hour flight from most European cities.

Indulge in the ultimate seaside living experience and make this beautiful apartment with a breathtaking sea view yours! Contact us for more information.

property_title: Two-bedroom apartments for sale in a new residential complex, “The Dreams by Dukley”
property_description:
These extraordinary two-bedroom apartments for sale are located in a new residential complex, “The Dreams by Dukley,” in the Synchro – the heart of Porto Montenegro, in Tivat. Porto Montenegro combines a spectacular lifestyle destination with a world-class, full-service marina and luxury residential village offering premium real estate for sale and rental in this part of the Mediterranean.
According to the Porto Montenegro development plan, the Synchro neighborhood is set to be the center of Tivat with a new five-star hotel, beach club with a swimming pool and lagoons, dedicated performance and event spaces, restaurants, and high-end shops.

The Dreams by Dukley project includes three apartment blocks (A, B, C) and a rooftop swimming pool connecting two separate blocks. Each building boasts luxurious apartments and spacious penthouses, designed perfectly with the highest quality materials. The project is coming to life with cutting-edge technology and premium materials, paying particular attention to sustainability and the finest details to provide residents with the ultimate living experience.

The basic package includes an elegant interior design, with the possibility of choosing between two styles – Italian and Nordic. Additionally, upon request, each apartment can be furnished and equipped with fixtures and fittings of the highest quality. With ownership of the real estate in The Dreams by Dukley, you will have a dedicated concierge service and security, which will be at your disposal 24/7.  Other amenities include a rooftop infinity pool, an underground garage, dedicated storage units, and a smart home system.

property_title: Villa with a fantastic sea view
property_description:
Thisvilla for saleis located in village Blizikuće – Carsko selo,in Budva municipality. Blizikuće is one of the most beautiful places along Budva riviera and is located in the hills above the famous St.Stefan, a famous Montenegrin islet-hotel.

The size of the villa is 216m², with a plot of 305m². The estate spreads over two levels. There is a living room, a kitchen,  and one bedroom with a bathroom on the first floor. On the second floor, there are two bedrooms and a bathroom. There are three terraces with a magnificent sea view.  The villa is finished outside, while the fine interior work and furnishing are left to the new owner to decorate according to his ideas.

Within the villa, there is a swimming pool. There is also one big shared swimming pool in the residential area. The parking space is in the central part of the residential village and belongs to all villa owners.

In a peaceful and quiet area, this villa is perfect for family life or a holiday retreat, ideally positioned to enjoy the beauty of this part of the Mediterranean sea.

Regarding connectivity, it takes about 12km to the Old Town and port of Budva, 33km to the airport Tivat, and 35km to the Porto Montenegro marina for superyachts. It is well-positioned, just above the main road that connects Budva and Bar.

Contact us if you recognize this extraordinary property as an excellent choice.

property_title: Small hotel for sale with beautiful sea view
property_description:
This attractive small hotel for sale is located in Petrovac, in Budva municipality. Petrovac is a beautiful little city on the Montenegrin coast and is ideal for family holidays. Lučice Beach, Buljarica Beach, and central Petrovac Beach, with the fine reddish pebbles, are three perfect places for an excellent summer vacation.

The 19-room hotel with 700m² of living space is located on the hill, allowing most apartments astonishing sea views. Part of the apartments are studios, and part is standard one-bedroom apartments. All apartments are furnished and air-conditioned, and all units feature a kitchenette fitted with a refrigerator, stovetop, and kettle. Every unit features a private bathroom with a shower.

Located in Prijevorac, a Petrovac borough, within a 15-20 minutes walking distance from the city center and its beach, the hotel has small village privacy and all the city benefits. Lucice, the closest beach, has an advantage over the overcrowded one in Petrovac not only by the number of visitors and by prices but also by the sea water clearness. You will pass a great olive grove on your 7-8-minute walk to the beach. Those not afraid of long distances can visit an even less crowded Buljarica beach over the hill.

This property can be used as a hotel, but it could be interesting for some investors to reconstruct the building into separate apartments and put them on the market for further sale. The property prices in this part of the Adriatic riviera are continuously rising, which can be an excellent investment opportunity for the future owners of this hotel.

The property has an excellent location, only 29km from Tivat airport and 37km from Podgorica airport, while Kotor Old Town is 29 km from the hotel.

If you think this property is an excellent choice for your investment, feel free to contact us for more information.

property_title: Two-bedroom apartment for sale in the residential building “Tre Canne”
property_description:
This beautiful two-bedroom apartment for sale is located in the heart of Budva, just 50 meters from the beautiful sandy beach and 200 meters from the Old Town and luxury marine yachts. “Tre Canne” residential building is a symbol of modern architecture and one of the major landmarks of Budva, with its three beautiful glass towers. With its medieval Old Town, sun-soaked beaches, and lively nightlife, Budva is the stand-out attraction along the Montenegrin coastline.

 

The apartment with an area of 104m² is located on the 5th floor of the “Tre Canne” building. This spacious, comfortable apartment consists of a big living room, kitchen with dining place, two comfortable bedrooms, two bathrooms, and two large terraces where you can enjoy a fantastic panoramic view of the Adriatic Sea and the mountains. The apartment is fully equipped with furniture and appliances for a comfortable living or summer vacation.

 

At the entrance to the apartment, there is a hallway with a large built-in wardrobe. There is a bathroom on the right and the kitchen immediately on the left. The kitchen is in one room together with the living room. The living room opens onto a smaller terrace. From the living room, there is another corridor that leads to the second bathroom on the left, one bedroom on the right, and straight from the hall to the second bedroom, from which there is a large terrace with a view of the sea and the mountains.

 

An underground parking place with an elevator directly to the building is particularly convenient for the owners. “Tre Canne” complex has a variety of shops, restaurants, cafes, and beauty salons, so you can easily find everything you need for everyday life just “around the corner.”  

 

Well positioned, this apartment is only 24km away from Tivat international airport and 68km from the airport in Podgorica, the capital of Montenegro. Please feel free to contact us for more information if you are interested in this beautiful seafront two-bedroom apartment.

property_title: Stylish Two-Bedroom Apartment with Sea View

Stretching along the stunning shoreline of the Bay of Kotor, Dobrota is renowned for its serene beauty, charming stone houses, and panoramic coastal views.

  • Two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a walk-in closet;

Location Highlights:

  • Just 5 minutes from Kotor Old Town

property_title: Exceptional contemporary villa “Horizon” for sale
property_description:
This exceptional contemporary villa estate, touched by traditional Montenegrin architecture, is settled in the heart of the Luštica peninsula, in Đuraševići village, Tivat municipality. A perfect sanctuary, villa Horizons is located on a prime coastal hillside, on the doorsteps of the luxury playgrounds and marinas of Lustica Bay and Porto Montenegro. The wild beauty of the Montenegrin coast with its secluded beaches and fishing villages are all within easy reach of the Estate.

Set in 5,643 m2 of secluded woodland and landscaped stone terraces, the Estate comprises two independent villas of 558 m2 in total, designed as an integrated living space.

 

The upper/main house:

The ground floor comprises a spacious high-ceiling living area with floor-to-ceiling openings, a separate, fully equipped kitchen opening onto the pergola-covered terrace and a citrus orchard, two double bedrooms with bathrooms, and an internal staircase leading to a large utility/technical/storage room and a double garage to the rear of the property.

The first floor entirely forms the master bedroom with an en suite bathroom and additional room intended for a study, dressing room, or bedroom. The master bedroom exits to the large glass-balustraded, limestone-paved roof terrace with panoramic views of the sea and mountains. Another, the smaller terrace is on the right, providing views of the estate’s woodland.

 

The lower/pool house:

The pool house comprises an open-plan living room with a dining area and fully equipped kitchen and floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the pool, three en suite bedrooms, a sauna, a flex room intended for a gym, yoga space, or a TV room, and a guest toilet.

The saltwater swimming pool measuring 24m x 5 m, framed with olive trees, with a barbecue area, and a sun deck covered with a retractable pergola is set in front of the pool house.

 

The key property specifications include:

  • Eco-sustainable Daiken air source heat pumps provide the AC and underfloor heating/cooling.
  • Luxuriously specified finishing, with bathrooms by Ceramica Catalano and Royo, ceramics by Ceramica Vogue, flooring by Porcelanosa, and lighting by Flos, Vibia, Luce, Bright, and C4.
  • Saltwater swimming pool with Appiani mosaics and an outside Bossini shower.
  • Effe Sky Sauna, two Nolte kitchens with Bosch appliances, Alumil bioclimatic (remote controlled) pergola.
  • Double garage, large storage, utility, and technical rooms (housing centrally controlled CCTV and Video Intercom, Security & Fire Alarms).
  • Securely gated entrance road and parking.
  • Fiber optic cable connectivity provides high-speed internet with wide WiFi coverage.

 

Locally sourced limestone facades form a sleek, clean modern outline, supported by rustic stone terraced walls. Floor-to-ceiling glass openings frame the spectacular panoramic views of the Adriatic coast and the Lovcen mountains beyond. Indoor and outdoor living spaces are seamlessly joined to provide a classic Mediterranean lifestyle.

Bioclimatic Alumil pergolas, shade-covered terraces, limestone paving, and a stone BBQ provide additional spaces for relaxation and entertainment. The heart of the Estate is a spectacular 24m long saltwater swimming pool, framed by olive trees and capped by a retractable pergola over Deco decking.

If you dream about the perfect home at the Adriatic sea, for your family and friends’ gatherings, in a peaceful and quiet area but still close to the all tourist key points, this property is an ideal choice for you. Villa Horizon is perfectly positioned in the close vicinity of Tivat airport (10km), Luštica Bay resort and marine (4km), Porto Montenegro marina (12km), and Old town Kotor (12km).

For more information about this extraordinary property, feel free to contact us for more information.

property_title: Four-bedroom apartment for sale in Pržno, Budva
property_description:
This four-bedroom apartment for sale is located in Pržno, in Budva municipality. Pržno is a small fishing place that joins together the spirit of the old with the modern glamour. The atmosphere of an authentic fishing place with the traditional way of fishing, an air spa – Miločer park full of pine, a 20-minute walk through a cedar forest to the Sveti Stefan, and famous fish restaurants, are just a few advantages of this place.

The 112m² apartment is on the 4th floor of a building and is on two levels. On the first level (74m²) there is a large living room, a kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, and a hallway. On the second level, there are two bedrooms and a bathroom. The apartment is fully furnished, with all the necessary appliances. Windows are wood-aluminum of Italian brand Profilati, with a mechanism for electronically raising blinds. There is underfloor heating in the bathrooms and the “Vileroy&Bosch” sanitation. The bathrooms and the terrace are covered with natural stone (marble). The apartment is airconditioned, with LG multi-split system with 5 internal units.

There is a parking place in the garage, on the ground floor of the building, and an elevator from the garage to the apartment.

This building has an excellent position and is centrally located in the Pržno, less than five minutes walk from the beach. Well positioned, this apartment is only 31km away from Tivat international airport and 59km from the airport in Podgorica, the capital of Montenegro.
We believe that this property is perfect for your family and friends’ gatherings, during the whole year. If you are interested in a sea view apartment, feel free to contact us for more information.

property_title: Villa for sale in Boka Bay, with amazing sea view
property_description:
This beautiful newly built villa for sale, with an amazing sea view, is located in the biggest fisherman’s village in Boka Bay –  Morinj. Morinj is halfway between the towns of Kotor and Herceg Novi. This small picturesque seaside hamlet is known for its lush green mountainous slopes, crystal clear springs and creeks, old watermills, and rich cultural history. Its natural pebble beach, lush forests, and network of interconnected springs, known as Little Venice (Mala Venecija), is perfectly suited for families who wish to spend their holiday truly immersed in the local culture, history, and untouched nature.

The villa is well positioned, just above the main road. The plot measures an area of 241m², with greenery behind the house, and two parking places in front of the villa. The villa consists of 4 levels. On the ground floor, there is the kitchen, wine cellar, and billiard room. On the first floor, there are three bedrooms with bathrooms. On the second floor is a spacious living room with a fireplace, a kitchen and a dining room, and a storage room. On the third floor is a swimming pool, with a beautiful view of Boka bay and a summer kitchen near it. There is also a technical room in a villa, with video surveillance and boilers, and other equipment. From the terraces and a yard, you will have a magnificent sea view.

The villa comes unfurnished, so you can arrange it in your own style. Villa is air-conditioned and the underfloor heating. The roof-top swimming pool and the garden are the perfect places for family joy and gatherings with friends.

This villa is just 2 minute drive from one of the most popular restaurants in Boka Bay – Ćatovića Mlini. House is situated in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood, only 12km from Tivat and Porto Montenegro marina for superyachts (via ferry Kamenari-Lepetane) and only 25km from Kotor Old town.

Do not hesitate to contact us for more information, we truly believe that this villa could be a perfect choice for your new home.

property_title: A beautiful stone villa for sale
property_description:
A beautiful stone villa for sale is located in Opatovo, Tivat Municipality. Tivat is in the central part of the Bay of Kotor. Once it was a small coastal town, and today is the center of nightlife and important events, thanks to the Porto Montenegro residential area and marina for superyachts.

This authentic Mediterranean-style villa is 125m², with a land area of 123m². There is an outdoor swimming pool and a private concrete beach with boat mooring. The small yard is equipped with a complete outdoor kitchen, barbecue, and lounge area.

The villa consists of three levels. On the ground floor, there is the living room with a wine cellar and a fireplace, a kitchen with a dining room, and a guest toilet. Internal stairs lead to the first floor with two bedrooms and one bathroom. On the second floor, there is a master bedroom with a bathroom and a big terrace with a swimming pool.

Stone walls and rustic wooden elements create a warm and pleasant atmosphere in the house. All rooms are spacious, with carefully chosen furniture, design details, and accessorize. The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances. There is a smart home system in the villa, and also a security system with video surveillance. The villa is for sale fully furnished.

Within 4 minutes drive from this place lies a luxury yacht complex and marina village Porto Montenegro, with fancy restaurants, cozy bars, an art gallery, a maritime museum, a great swimming pool LidoMar, a private British school, and a sailing school. Tivat airport is only 6km away.

If you are looking for your second home, this place is perfect for your family and friends’ gatherings. Settled in a first sea line, with a magnificent view of Boka Bay and the nearby vicinity of all necessary amenities, this villa offers great rental potential and is an excellent investment opportunity.

To find out more information about this property, please contact us.

property_title: Villa on the front line
property_description:
This newly built villa is situated in Kotor Bay, in the picturesque place Strp-an authentic village, with traditional old stone houses. Villa is located on the front line, with its beach and mooring for yachts up to 35m.

The villa consists of three levels.

The ground floor consists of an entrance hall, spacious living room, dining room, kitchen, hall, toilet, pantry, and stairway. The living room leads to the terrace with a swimming pool.

Upstairs are two apartments with bathrooms. Both apartments have terraces overlooking the sea.

In the attic is situated the third apartment with a bathroom, with access to an open roof terrace.

Villa has a private swimming pool, landscaped gardens and terraces, and two outbuildings in the laurel forest in the villa hinterland. The first outbuilding is a place for recreation and a spa. It consists of a gym and sauna with a bathroom.

The villa has easy access to the main road with 4 outdoor and two indoor parking spaces. Within it, there is a technical room and an apartment for staff accommodation.

Nearby is one of the most famous restaurants in Montenegro. Villa is situated on the first line to the sea, 15km from the Porto Montenegro Marina and 18km from Tivat airport.

property_title: Penthouse apartment for sale in Dukley Gardens
property_description:
This extraordinary three-bedroom penthouse apartment for sale is located in the heart of Montenegro’s bustling Budva riviera, in Dukley Gardens residential development. This lushly landscaped, waterfront community, set against the charming Old town of Budva, is oriented towards the sea for premium coastal views and is an elegant new paradigm for modern waterfront living.

Each residence in Dukley Gardens is enhanced with generous outdoor living space and constructed to the highest international standards, featuring premier finishings, from built-in kitchens and luxury fixtures through high-end appliances and designed with extraordinary attention to quality and detail.

This 255m² (+202m² rooftop terrace) apartment consists of two levels: on the first floor is an open-plan living room with a terrace that has a magnificent sea view, equipped with sunbeds and an open dining area, a kitchen with a dining room, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a guest toilet, and laundry room. All bedrooms have access to terraces. The apartment is fully furnished and ready to move in. It is equipped with modern top-designed furniture, Poliform built-in kitchen, Miele appliances, Villeroy & Boch, Dornbracht kitchen and bath fixtures, and superior finishes. On the second level of the apartment is a rooftop sweeping sea-view terrace, with a jacuzzi, shower, lounge, and dining area. From both terraces, you will have a beautiful sea view of the Budva Old town.

Wired for complete security with state-of-the-art, Smart Home technology, this residence may be controlled remotely through the homeowner’s device. Each property’s lighting and climate controls, as well as, multi-media systems, home security, and surveillance systems, are easily regulated via smartphone or tablet.

Dukley Gardens prizes privacy and avoids the constant flow of non-residents milling about. Offering all the premier amenities of a five-star hotel, Dukley provides exceptional personal assistance to its residents. The benefits of residency are:

  • 24-hour Concierge & Security
  • Secure, Private & Valet Parking
  • Private Car Service: local transportation and airport transfers
  • Coordination of Car, Motorcycle, and Boat rentals as well as tours & excursions
  • Mooring for boats up to 70 meters at the 300-berth Dukley Marina
  • Water Shuttle Service to Budva, Oldtown, and Dukley Marina
  • A Fleet of Golf Carts within the complex for deliveries and transportation
  • State-of-the-art Smart Home Security Systems
  • Real estate & Property insurance
  • Children’s Centre, Summer Camp, Kindergarten, Child Care Services
  • Fitness & Wellness Facilities
  • Sandy, Fully Serviced, Beach Front
  • Private Pool
  • Water Sports equipment & rental
  • Housekeeping & Laundry Service
  • Room Service from Dukley Gardens in-house kitchen or the Dukley Beach Lounge
  • Stylish dining and drinks Venues
  • Waterfront Beach Club
  • Catering & Event Management
  • Property & Rental Management Services
  • Private Online account: Secure web line for communication, remote operation, and electronic document storage.

For those homeowners seeking a regular return on their investment, Dukley Gardens offers a professional, year-round, property management program. Overseeing short and long, term rental arrangements, Dukley’s full-service, on-site team supervises every detail from marketing and booking through airport transfers, key handovers, security, and maintenance.

Dukley Gardens uses the full advantage of its privileged location on the Zavala peninsula, in the center of Montenegrin tourism in Budva. Well positioned, this development is only 27km away from Tivat international airport and 65km from the airport in Podgorica, the capital of Montenegro.

We believe that this property is perfect for your family and friends’ gatherings, during the whole year. If you are interested in this extraordinary sea view penthouse apartment, feel free to contact us for more information.

The second floor consists of 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, with two large terraces, both with a magnificent sea view.

In front of the house is a wonderful swimming pool. In addition to other listed facilities, the villa also has a Finnish sauna.

Villa is situated in a quiet and peaceful area, 15km from Budva Old town and 37km from Porto Montenegro marina.

property_title: Beautiful waterfront villa with pool
property_description:
This beautiful waterfront villa for sale is located in Prčanj, next to the famous landmark historical monument “Tre Sorelle”.  The plot measures an area of 910m2, with a beautiful green yard, swimming pool, and children’s playground.

The villa consists of four levels, including the basement.

In the basement, there is a wine cellar and a sauna for six persons.

The ground floor consists of a spacious open plan living area/dining room, beautiful and well-equipped kitchen, bathroom, and a gym. There is underfloor heating in all bathrooms.

The first floor consists of 4 en-suite bedrooms, two large terraces, one with a sea view, and another with a view of the swimming pool.

On the second floor, there is a large entertainment room with a tv saloon, library, pool table, and card table, as well as a bathroom and a wardrobe.

Behind the house is a large swimming pool (811x4m), as well as a lounge zone and a summer kitchen.

Villa is furnished with antique furniture. Among all the equipment, there is also a technical room with accessories smart home system (cameras, fire alarm,  Daikin steam heating equipment).

Villa is situated on the first line to the sea, only 4km from Kotor Old town and 13km from the Porto Montenegro marina.

property_title: Renovated old stone villa in Perast
property_description:
This beautiful, 350 years oldstone villa for saleis locatedin Perast, in Kotor municipality. Perast, as an absolute highlight of theBay of Kotor, is one of the most beautiful baroque towns in Montenegro.

As a former sailor center, it still shines with marvelous buildings, pretty churches, and a romantic waterfront.

The villa is renovated in 2013. It has an area of 273m², with an additional terrace of 48m².

During the renovation, only the highest quality materials were used (Italian stone slabs and bathroom equipment, Dutch and French furniture, Toshiba air conditioning, Bosh households appliances, etc), so further investment is not needed any time soon.

From the spacious terrace, you have access right to the ground floor. There is the kitchen and living area with an old-fashioned stone fireplace, wine cellar, and the extra apartment next to the living room, with its bathroom and a small kitchen.

On the first floor, there is a big dining area with a kitchen, one bedroom, bathroom, and a terrace with an open sea view. There is a barbeque area on the same level, in the back of the house.

On the second floor, there are two bedrooms and one bathroom. The villa is air-conditioned and additionally, there is underfloor heating in the living room and all bathrooms.

In front of the villa, there is a big swimming pool 11mx5m, with heating, lighting, and a swimming geyser. Near the pool, together with pool furniture – deck chairs and parasols, there is also a rest area and an arranged space for family gatherings and outside dinners.

This villa is well known as the house with the largest garden in Perast, so it is a perfect place to enjoy it with your family and friends.

Below the pool, in the basement is a technical room. The villa is also equipped with video surveillance.

This beautiful old villa is just a few steps away from the beach, crystal clear seawater, and all other amenities and famous places in Perast.

In terms of connectivity, Old Town of Kotor is just 14km from the villa, airport Tivat 22km, Porto Montenegro marina for superyachts only 25km, and Porto Novi only 23km from here.

Thanks to such a good location, in the heart of Perast, the value of this property will only grow over time.

Do not hesitate to contact us for more information, we believe that this property won’t be so long on the market.

property_title: Modern villa  with a spectacular view
property_description:
This newly builtvilla for saleis situatedon the first sea line, in the village Đuraševićiin Tivat municipalityin Bay of Kotor. Đuraševići is located on the beginning of Luštica peninsula, close to a residential area of Luštica Bay, with a yacht marina and future golf courses.

The villa is positioned 20 meters from the sea and enjoys a spectacular view of the bay and in particular on the “Gospa od Milosti” island monastery. The villa has been conceived to perfectly match with the Mediterranean landscape, where stone, wood, and glass create the perfect harmony with the Mediterranean vegetation surrounding the villa.

The villa is composed of three different levels with a total net surface of approx 770m2. Including the terraces, the winter garden, the pool, and the private beach the total surface belonging to the villa reaches over 1,000m2.

The three levels are connected to each other with innovative and three-dimensional dynamic stair sets, which optimize the total perception of the open spaces and of the light. The Villa has been projected emphasizing the unique positioning of the villa in order to enjoy the spectacular view of the bay from every room in the building, including the ground floor.

All of this is further enhanced by the large terraces on every floor, representing the natural link between the in-spaces and the outdoor.

The ground floor, which has been ideated for the SPA and the recreation zone, represents a unique and spectacular architectural concept.

The recreation area, including a fitness gym, a pool table, and a Jacuzzi, despite being the lowest in the villa still maintains a privileged view of the sea giving a unique ambiance to the entire area.

The SPA has been created in a natural cave with the original cliffs being a main interior element.This unique link with nature probably makes the villa unique in the world as similar solutions can not be either ordered or projected – it simply happens once in a lifetime!

The first floor consists of a living area and kitchen, and the second floor consists of four bedrooms and four bathrooms.

The materials used for the interiors represent the ultimate technology innovation but at the same time, they have been used in harmony with the external area in order to create an ideal ambiance for relaxation and rest.

So far, only the main interior elements have been realized, whereas the new owner will be able to choose all the interior details in order to give a personalized touch to the villa.

The technology used for the main elements of the building –heating, water pumps, air conditioning, pools, and spa areas represents the ultimate achievements in modern construction.

The villa is completely independent with an original perfectly integrated stone wall guaranteeing total autonomy and privacy. Besides a reserved parking slot on the main street leading to the villa, within the protected area of the villa, there are is covered parking, premises for the safeguards, and housekeeping/maintenance, all dislocated from the main body of the villa.

On the beach, there is a separate building that guarantees that all the necessary comforts are nearby and easily accessible to enjoy a perfect day at sea, including a kitchen with a bar, a dressing room, a toilet, and a pantry.

A stone dock from the previous of the century has been renovated in order to be able to provide all the necessary equipment for yacht anchoring and comforts for the guests.

In terms of connectivity, Tivat airport is only 8km away, and Porto Montenegro marina is only 12km. Although the villa is located in a quiet and peaceful area, the proximity of Tivat and Kotor guarantees that for a short drive you can find yourself in the heart of all events.

We wish you plenty of free time to enjoy properly your new house! Contact us for more information.

property_title: Apartments for sale in a residential building in Tivat
property_description:
Two bedrooms apartments for sale ina residential building inTivat

This residential building “Tamaris” is located in the center of Tivat, next to the luxury estate Porto Montenegro, on the rim of the new Boka Place district.

Tivat is in the central part of the Bay of Kotor. Once it was a small coastal town, and today is the center of nightlife and important events, thanks to the Porto Montenegro residential area and marina for superyachts.

Tivat is a prime location to reside in year-round, compared to other coastal regions of Montenegro.

The residential building “Tamaris” consists of 12 residential units, 9 of which offer beautiful sea views. The building has been carefully designed to make its occupants feel comfortable and carefree with the grace of a peaceful life and the privacy of living at sea.

The building consists of 3 residential units on the ground floor, whose specific position and space usage provide a lot of light, and three floors with three residential units each. Apartments are of different plots and structures: one-bedroom and two-bedrooms, with balconies or terraces surrounded by the greenery, big enough to resemble smaller yards.

The building has two entrances.

Modern middle and high-range materials were used in the construction process. A team of architects made sure that the modern Mediterranean style of the building matched the style of nearby Porto Montenegro residences.

The apartments have a maximal space usage design and are mostly still unfurnished, so future owners have the opportunity to arrange them by their own preferences.

There is an outdoor parking place for each apartment. There are 14 parking places within the building’s outdoor parking, available exclusively to the residents of the building.

  • Ground floor, 69m², 172.500€SOLD

Settled in a peaceful and quiet neighborhood, in the nearby vicinity of all necessary amenities, these apartments offer great rental potential and are an excellent investment opportunity.

property_title: New villa, with a pier, for sale in Tivat municipality
property_description:
This newly built villa for sale is situated on the coastline, in the village Krašići in Tivat municipality. Krašići is located on the Luštica peninsula, on the southern shore of the Bay of Tivat in the Bay of Kotor. Near Krašići is a residential area of Luštica Bay, with a yacht marina and future golf courses.

Villa is on the first line from the sea, with direct access from the main road, and with a berth of 120m² with all connections for yachts. In 10 min boat drive across the Bay you have direct access to Porto Montenegro and Porto Novi – famous tourist resorts and marinas for superyachts.

Villa of 300m² consists of 3 levels.

At the lowest level, there are two rooms – one maintenance room and one guest’s bedroom, a laundry and a sauna. There is also a terrace with direct access to the sea. Surrounded by greenery, this terrace is perfect for socializing and family gatherings throughout the year.

An internal staircase leads to the middle level, where there is a spacious living and dining room, kitchen, and toilet. Large windows provide a beautiful view of the Bay. At the same level is an infinity pool with a jacuzzi and a terrace that goes around the pool and in front of the living room. The wine cellar is on the same floor.

At the highest level, there are two bedrooms, both with a bathroom. The smaller bedroom has a terrace with a beautiful sea view on the Tivat bay.

The entire villa is equipped with a smart home system, and all bathrooms have underfloor heating. The materials of the highest quality were used during the construction. The villa is protected from the road noise with a tunnel 1.5 m wide over the entire height of the building, so there are no sounds or vibrations from the road.

The villa additionally has a utility room for storage for beach furniture.

In terms of air connectivity, there are three airports nearby: Tivat 10km, Podgorica 90km, and Dubrovnik 60km, so arrival and departure will not be a problem. Krašići is mostly a tourist and fishing village, with many restaurants and small shops, and the value of a villa like this one can only grow over the years.

If you recognize this property as a good investment opportunity, contact us for more information.

property_description:
Thiscommercial place/mini-hotel for saleis locatedinthe heart of theOld Town of Kotor, near the main city square.

The old town of Kotor is under the protection ofUNESCOas a world cultural and natural heritage, with beautiful stone houses, churches, towers, squares, and fountains behind the walls of the city fortress. The old town of Kotor is one of the most important ports and shopping centers on the Adriatic, known as the city of museums, sights, culture, and architecture.

The old nucleus of Kotor today is considered to be the best-preserved medieval urban entity in the Mediterranean.

This property consists of two separate apartments, on two floors of the building, and now is in function as a small hotel.

The size of the apartment on the first floor is 123m² and it has 5 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a shared kitchen, and a hallway. Another space (144m²) is on the second floor, with four apartments with their own bathrooms, shared kitchen and dining area, living room, and a hallway.

All apartments are fully furnished, with modern equipment and all necessary amenities, and provide excellent conditions for a comfortable family living, but also have excellent potential for rent as hotel space.

All rooms are airconditioned.

In terms of connections with important waterways, roads, and airports, the Port of Kotor is located just across from the Old Town, and less than 10km separates this facility from Tivat Airport and Porto Montenegro Marina for superyachts. In the heart of the Old Town, close to popular restaurants and shops, this property is an ideal opportunity for you.

property_title: Beautiful waterfront stone house
property_description:
This beautiful stone house for sale is situated on the first line in Dobrota, only a 5 minutes drive from Kotor Old town. It is located in a quiet part of town, just a few steps away from a private mole and nice restaurants.

The house consists of four levels, with 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, an open plan living area, and a kitchen.

The ground floor consists of an open plan living area and a kitchen, toilet, and wine cellar.

On the first floor, there are two bedrooms with bathrooms.

On the second floor, there are two bedrooms, one is fully equipped and the second is still empty. From the furnished bedroom, you can go out into the yard behind the house.

The third floor is not equipped yet, and there is one open-plan room on it.

In front of the house, there is a small garden and barbeque area.

The house has a lovely view from the stone balcony on the Bay of Boka.

House is in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood, 6km from the Kotor Old town and 17km from the Porto Montenegro marina.

property_title: Villa AQUILA
property_description:
If you want to enjoy a great ambiance, with a breathtaking view, this exceptional Mediterranean villa is the right choice for you. Situated in a quiet, picturesque corner of UNESCO-protected Kotor Bay, this secluded villa provides the perfect sanctuary, with commanding sea views surrounded by mountains and sprawling Mediterranean gardens.

 The villa design is sleek, with clean lines and open, spacious interiors. Mediterranean limestone walls and characteristic sloping terracotta roof tiles float above floor-to-ceiling glass windows to maximize natural light and unobstructed, dramatic views across the Bay towards Kotor Old Town and the mountains beyond.

On the ground floor, there is a large double garage, gym, laundry/utility, storage, and technical rooms (Central Control and AirCon, CCTV, Video Intercom, Fire & Security, WIFI).

The first floor consists of a glass-enclosed entrance reception at the center, directly opening courtyard decking and a pool beyond.  To the left are high-ceiling living space, wood-burning stove, and kitchen areas with panoramic views of the bay and mountains.  To the right, large master bedroom and bath ensuite opening to decking and pool, additional double bedroom/flex-use, bathroom and sauna, guest WC.

On the second floor, there are 3 large double bedrooms with ensuite (and walkthrough), outside terrace with a magnificent sea view.

Premium kitchen (Nobilia/Bosch) and bathroom fittings (V&B, Catalano, HansG), ceramics, and flooring (Florim, Porcelanosa, and natural stone) are used throughout.  Living areas and bathrooms with underfloor heating recessed AirCon and ventilation in ceilings.

In front of the villa, there is the infinity pool and shower, decking, limestone paving terraces, and BBQ, with substantial wild garden areas.

Villa Aquila offers the dream combination of peaceful seclusion, whilst lying within easy reach of the local waterfront village marina and a short drive to the historic walled city of Kotor, the luxury yachting haven of Porto Montenegro and Tivat International Airport.
