property_title: Villa VELA
property_description:
This exceptional Mediterranean villa is situated in a Prčanj, with a beautiful view of Boka Bay and mountains. Approached via a private, securely-gated road, Villa Vela is a spacious 4 bedroom contemporary home with a luxuriously specified interior, infinity pool, and double garage.

The villa design is sleek, with clean lines and open, spacious interiors. Mediterranean limestone walls and characteristic sloping terracotta roof tiles float above floor-to-ceiling glass windows to maximize natural light and unobstructed, dramatic views across the Bay towards Kotor Old Town and the mountains beyond.

On the ground floor, there is a large double garage, gym, toilet, laundry/utility, storage, and technical rooms (Central Control and AirCon, CCTV, Video Intercom, Fire & Security, WIFI).

There is a glass-enclosed entrance reception at the center of the first floor. To the right, there are a high-ceiling living space, wood-burning stove, and kitchen areas with panoramic views of the bay and mountains, and quest toilet.  To the left, large master bedroom and bath ensuite opening to decking and pool.

On the second floor, there are large double and two standard bedrooms, all with ensuite, outside terrace, and access to walled patio areas and mountainous wild gardens.

Premium kitchen (Nobilia/Bosch) and bathroom fittings (V&B, Catalano, HansG), ceramics, and flooring (Florim, Porcelanosa, and natural stone) are used throughout.  Living areas and bathrooms with underfloor heating recessed AirCon and ventilation in ceilings.

In front of the villa, there is the infinity pool and shower, decking, limestone paving terraces, and BBQ, with substantial wild garden areas.

Villa Vela offers the dream combination of peaceful seclusion, whilst lying within easy reach of the local waterfront village marina and a short drive to the historic walled city of Kotor, the luxury yachting haven of Porto Montenegro and Tivat International Airport.

property_title: Family home with sea view
property_description:
This family, warmly decorated house with an amazing sea view is located in Orahovac, only a 15 minutes drive from Kotor Old town. The plot measures an area of 670m2, with a beautiful green yard, swimming pool, and children’s playground.

The house consists of 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a living area with a fireplace, two wardrobes, and a kitchen. Cozy terrace with barbeque place has a beautiful sea view.

On the ground floor, there is an open plan living area, kitchen, two bedrooms, and two bathrooms. The living room is furnished in a warm family way, with fireplace and art paintings on the walls. The kitchen is fully equipped, with a wooden kitchen and dining elements.

The first floor consists of one bedroom, one bathroom, and a large terrace with a spectacular sea view

There is one additional apartment on the first floor, with one bedroom, bathroom, living room, and kitchen, that can be used as a guest apartment.

The house comes fully furnished, and it is air-conditioned. The finishing materials are of high quality – Italian ceramic tile and natural ash parquet with internal pine overlaps. There is floor heating in each bathroom.

The house is just 2 minutes drive from the restaurant and beach bar.

House is situated in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood, 8km from Kotor Old town and 20km from the Porto Montenegro marina.

property_title: Penthouse for sale in the residential complex in Dobrota, in Kotor municipality
property_description:
Welcome to your dream home nestled in the charming village of Dobrota – the most famous residential area in Kotor, overlooking the breathtaking Boka Bay. This luxurious penthouse, situated on the fourth floor of an elegant building, offers an expansive living space of 200m², complemented by two terraces totaling 203m², perfect for indulgent relaxation and family gatherings.

Property Features:

  • Spacious Living Areas: Step into a generously sized living room, seamlessly connected to a modern kitchen and dining area, creating an ideal space for both entertaining and everyday living.
  • Elegant Bedrooms and Bathrooms: With four bedrooms and three bathrooms, including a master suite, this penthouse provides ample accommodation for families or those who love to host guests.
  • Comfort and Convenience: Enjoy the comfort of air conditioning and floor heating throughout the apartment, ensuring a cozy ambiance in every season. The apartment is in this moment unfurnished, but the owner is waiting for the furniture to come very soon.
  • Outdoor Oasis: The crowning jewel of this penthouse is its rooftop terrace, complete with provisions for a jacuzzi and summer kitchen. Revel in panoramic views of the bay and surrounding mountains while indulging in al fresco dining or unwinding in the soothing waters.
  • Parking: Two parking spaces in the garage are included, providing convenience and security for your vehicles.

Location Highlights:

Dobrota epitomizes tranquility and charm, with its abundance of citrus and olive trees lending to its inviting atmosphere. Residents will appreciate the village’s warm hospitality and picturesque surroundings.

  • Beachfront Living: A 7km-long beach zone, comprising both concrete and pebble areas, stretches along the village, offering residents the perfect escape for sun-soaked days by the water.
  • Convenience and Connectivity: Just a short 5-minute drive away lies the historic Old Town of Kotor, a UNESCO World Heritage Site brimming with cultural treasures. Additionally, the proximity to Tivat Airport (17km) and Porto Montenegro marina ensures effortless travel and access to world-class amenities.

If you’re captivated by the allure of this newly built penthouse in Dobrota, don’t hesitate to reach out to us for further details. Your coastal sanctuary awaits.
